description:
You've only been at Black Rock City for a few days now and you've already violated several if not all of the 10 Principles.  Did you fail to chase down that moop headed to the trash fence?  Maybe you're all inclusive except for shirtcockers?  You probably can't name more than 3 of the 10 Principles.  If so, The Disciples of the Dust will be operating a confessional for those who have violated  the 10 Principles.  Confess your transgressions, accept your penance and receive absolution.  You can trust the Disciples...... we're trained professionals!    
We believe Larry will stop by and give us his blessing.  Have your picture taken with Larry or our facsimile of Larry descending the mount with the 10 Principles Tablet.
title: 10 Principles Confessional
print_description: Failed to pick up some moop, not inclusive when it comes to shirtcockers,  then visit the 10 Principles Confessional for absolution.  Larry may visit.

description:
Soul food got its name in the 1960's from the commensality - or practice of eating together - of generations of Southerners who headed far from their family origins during the Great Migration. It reminded them of home.

Soul Brunch isn't just a party; it's like the backyard barbecues of home. It's like the cookouts of yesteryear. As your families invited your communities over, as the generations of soul families invited their communities over, so too does the Heroes & Super Villains family invite the Playa community over to eat together, drink together, get to know one another, dance with each other and uplift each other.

From morning until nightfall, our trained chefs serve up the freshest breakfast burritos on the Playa, accompanied by professionally made craft cocktails. Our collection of international DJs spin smooth beats until nightfall.

We also give revelers a chance to clean up with our Soul Power Showers; guests experience the rebirth and rejuvenation of cool, cleansing water sprayed forcefully from our pressurized washer system (imagine a water saving car wash inside our shower areas for guests). Baptized anew, heroes set out on their way spreading positive vibes.

DJ Lineup:
-Marques Wyatt
-Nicodemus
-Deep Woods
-Sabo
-Rafael de la Cruz
title: 10th Anniversary Soul Brunch and Power Showers
print_description: Breakfast burritos, craft cocktails, bumping bass, and power showers. A neighborhood block party from our family to yours.

description: Join Mission Country Club for our 12th annual Sangria Soundclash. Enjoy 50 gallons of hand-crafted highly-reinforced Playa Sangria while dancing to salsa, cumbia, merengue, boricua, latin hip hop, and other juicy international beats... Starting at 4:20 and ending when everyone gets drunk and passes out.

description:
Group W at Math Camp is hosting our 13th Annual Welcome the Sun
Sunrise Cocktail Party starting around 6:20 AM at Burning Man.

The bar will be excellent:  AWESOME Bloody Marys, Tequila Marys, maybe COFFEE (regular or Irish), Mimosas, bourbon, Scotch, water, Math Themed Drinks and who knows what else.

So whether you want a night-cap as you strut home in triumph or you need eye-open to start the day right, come on over!  Last year the final drinks were poured around midnight, so even if you sleep late Group W is
there waiting you.

Stop by any time for crunchy snacks or graham crackers!

Please be 21 years of age or older to be served
alcoholic beverages.
title: 13th Annual Welcome the Sun Sunrise Cocktail Part
print_description:
Group W is hosting our 13th Annual Welcome the Sun Sunrise Cocktail Party starting about 6:20 AM. 

Nobody turned away for poor liver functionality.

description: Come with 1 topic or question-love, manifestation, career, patterns that are coming up for you here on the playa etc.During readings, we see things in the form of pictures which are literal or symbolic and the blocks or karmic patterns that are standing in the way.  These blocks and patterns can have roots in past lives or may be influenced from the energy of other people. Our work together hones in on the finding and removing the origins of patterns that no longer serve you.  We end each session with a few minutes of healing.

description: Beekeepers and wannabees come together for a hivemind discussion of all things bee. Want to be a beekeeper but don't know where to start? If a flock is to gulls, what's a group of beekeepers? An argument!   (Prior experience not necessary).  Beek out with us while enjoying our lavender lemonade.

description:
The 5 Rhythms is a simple, but profound movement meditation practice. There are no steps to learn and this dance is accessible to everyone regardless of age, share or experience.

We will dance two waves, gently guided. Come discover the dance only you can do.
title: 5 Rhythms Dance
print_description: The 5 Rhythms is a simple profound movement meditation practice created by Gabrielle Roth. All ages & dance skill set welcome. Held in the Stage Dome.

description: 5Rhythms is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed. It is a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirement is a body that is still breathing, a heart that is still beating, and a mind that is still curious! Come "Sweat Your Prayers" the Santa Fe way with Chloe Goodwin at RhythmWave!
title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Chloe Goodwin @ RhythmWave
print_description: 5Rhythms dance is a simple, yet powerful moving meditation. Come "Sweat Your Prayers" the Santa Fe way with Chloe Goodwin at RhythmWave!

description: Ever feel uncomfortable in your own skin, like you just need to break free? Or stuck in the same, endless mental loop? You're not alone. But all it takes to end this vicious pattern is one step, consciously taken, then another, and another - and before you know it, you're dancing! Old or young, novice or expert, afraid or unworried, join us in sluffing off some unnecessary layers one simple step at a time. You will dance your way to a new sense of self.  With Mackenzie Amara
title: 5Rhythms for Freedom
print_description: Uncomfortable in your own skin? Sluff off unnecessary layers one step at a time and dance urself to a new sense of self.-Mackenzie Amara

description: You are cordially invited to attend the annual Flaming Blue Phuck Thursday at 7 Sins Lounge.  Guests are welcomed to the friendliest little lounge on the playa by one of our host sinners and guided through the crowds to one of our welcoming bartenders.  These chemists will be hand crafting the legendary Flaming Blue Phuck for each of our guests with sinful care and great precision.  These time travel potions are sure to warm you to the core and settle your mind and soul into a sinfully blissful state.  Settle in for an hour or the night among friends.  Take a spin on the Wheel of Sins and receive absolution from our skilled staff from all your misdeeds.  Many have said that the year is not complete on playa until they've had their annual does of this flaming blue potion.  If you've yet to try yours, come pop your Blue Phuck cherry with us this year.
title: 7 Sins Lounge proudly serving Flaming Blue Phucks!
print_description: The infamous flaming drink returns for 1 night! Spin the Wheel of Sins for absolution and then take the sting out with our patented flaming libation!

description: Like to sing? Come to our vocal jam. A few years ago, we had a blast when a spontaneous chorus broke out in our camp, covering classic harmony-rich songs like Billy Joel's "For the Longest Time," and a tradition was born. We will gather and sing popular, well-known, or timeless songs in harmony (e.g., folk, pop, rock, opera, blues, barbershop, and on and on), without accompaniment (a capella). Song title lists provided to spark your vocal chords. All are welcome - no training needed.

description: Jennifer takes you on a journey in to the mystical realms of your super hero identity! Move, open and shine from your heart, as you are guided back into your ancient memory of why you chose to be here on Earth during this time. With a delightful recipe of music, primal movement, guided imagery, memory recall and visioning, your super hero will soon be awake in the dream and transforming your life.

print_description: Journey in to the mystical realms with music, movement, guided imagery and visioning. Your super hero will awake transforming your life.

description:
This workshop is about working with the magical, creative energy of Burning Man to create a plan-of-action to bring your unique offering to the world.  When you are holding onto your creative expression, your gifts, your particular genius, or pretending not to know what it is, it's gets very uncomfortable after a while. It will start itching inside of you to be created in physical form, it's deepest desire is to be born out of the dream space. You came to Planet Earth to share this, now is your time. Calling all healers, conversation-starters, rebels, light-workers, and medicine women. This workshop is broken down into four magical sections. 

1) Connection. How relating to others is the number one function of your business or passion project. We begin the workshop with getting connected on the soul level to your fellow sisters.
2) Reclaiming Your Unique Brilliance. Refining your message and creating something in the world that is unique, contributive, and that people will pay for. 
3) Healing Your Relationship With Money. Girl, if you want to start or expand your business, you've got to look at your drama and trauma with money. What would it be like if money flowed to you with ease? What would it be like if you could actually receive it? We will dive into this exploration together.
4) Closing Ritual. Our closing ritual will include a beautiful ceremony to hold each others intentions and desires as we go create in the world. You will be let into a "light-share" experience.
title: Activating Your Creative Feminine Magic
print_description: Calling all healers, conversation-starters, rebels, light-workers, and medicine women. Reclaim your feminine power and your boldest leadership.

description: The download has begun. We are increasingly intertwining with our technology. We are symbiotically joining our data-selves within the Great Machine. Companies and our government record so much of what we do, what does this mean for humanity? In this talk we will be exploring : What is Singularity and why are people talking about it? How does My Digital Life create a Virtual Data Version of You? How can we program the future to include humanity and our hearts? What will Sex, Love and Empathy look like in our Next Evolution? At the end of this talk you will learn how our community spiritual self is the force for change.
title: AI, mans quest to invent God. w/ Professor Stone
print_description: The current state of AI in todays society and how can we participate in shaping what might be the largest influence on life, culture and humankind

description:
Visit Ali Bar-Bar, the 'hottest' place in Silicon Village, to chill, drink, and dance. Our cozy Bedouin tent provides comfort and shelter day and night, while we serve drinks and entertain you.

Enter through the flashing Stargate to dance to our laser light show, watch or join in fire performances, and enjoy flaming cocktails that will burn you inside and out. Brave guests are invited to roll the dice and taste our 'burning balls'.

Sparkle Pony's Closet offers gently used Playawear in our Playa "store" where consultants will help you find your inner Sparkle Pony! 

Scheduled events:

Happy Hours: daily, 4pm-6pm, no cover, half price drinks. 
Flaming cocktails, ‘burning balls’, and fire performances: Tue, Wed, Thu 7pm-9pm, Fr 7pm-10pm. 
Late Night Blue Blazers: Thu, Fr, Sun, 2am-4am
Sparkle Pony's Closet: Tue, Wed, Thu, 10am-2pm.

description: Leave your Overly Attached Girlfriends at center camp, but bring your Good Girl Ginas. Enjoy the "Friend Zone" hammock space 20 feet above the Esplanade in our ridiculously photogenic dome. Advice Mallard sa.......god. 5 years....... I have been doing these things for 5 years. Stupid line after stupid line. There is more to life them memes and pictures of fucking cats! I don't know what to write. Do you people even read these? I'm not a "clever man". Do You Have idea how long it took me to write the short description? Like any idea? I hate to write and that shit took me like 2 hours. Really! Like 2 entire hours. Trying to think of lame punchy puns just for your enjoyment. Trying to get The Burning Man Meet-Up "back to it's roots". I mean half you fucking people will still miss the event and be like "I meant to go, but 15 drag queens in an art car wanted to have mimosas at the trash fence". YOU HAD ONE JOB, make it to the meet-up and pretend to not hate people for like a couple hours, but no you couldn't get your dusty, sun burnt ass out of your hexayurt. I don't know what I was expecting. Honestly I don't even know why I bother. I'm just going to use the same description year after year and you wont even notice. Fuck you people!"
title: [A]nnual Reddit r/burningman Meet-up
print_description: Come hang out with your fellow redditors IRL.  Pretend to care about the world beyond the sickly glow of your computer monitor.

description:

After a long day on the slopes, come to our alpine chalet. Mingle with the snow men, frolic with the ski bunnies, and relax those tired muscles in our winter wonderland. Take pictures of you and your friends skiing the slopes, dance your bum off to some of the best DJ's on the playa.

description: Feeling artistic? Prolific? Choose your favorite position/pose in our art studio: Stand, sit, or recline on either side of the “canvas” as the workshop artist or the on-stage model, and dwell in our Artists and Models moment. BYO drawing materials or any mediums you work  in, or use the pencils and pads we will have ready for you. All male and female models are welcome to participate. Sessions will range from 5 to 20 minutes. Our stage will not be easily visible from the street, just to our participating artists.
title: Artists and Models Drawing Session
print_description: Model! Create! Be on both sides of the “canvas.” New artists and models encouraged. All mediums welcomed. 5-20 min poses. BYO/use our stuff.

description: Ever wonder why we see the way we see? The way something looks to you, and to me?  Come learn how to draw, using proper perspective. It’s an art form to capture something long, or reflective.  Haven’t touched a pencil in years? Don’t worry my friend, I have guides, paper and tools!  It's a casual environment, so have no fear.  It's art we're making, and we're all learning here.  You'll go about your day afterward, with opened eyes and mind.  For perspective is the trick to viewing this trippy world correctly, you'll find.
title: Art of Perspective Drawing Class
print_description: Come learn how to draw, using proper perspective. It’s an art form to capture something long, or reflective.  I have guides, paper and tools!

description: See the Carnaval of Mirrors as envisioned by our artists!  This informal bike tour is hosted by volunteers from the ARTery (6:25 & Esplanade). A curated group of art projects will be visited and discussed. This tour will begin at 10:00 AM and run approximately 60-90 minutes, weather permitting. The tours are flexible so feel free to join us on playa if you see a bunch of bikes traveling in a pack, or drop out if you want. The tour starts promptly at the bike racks across from the ARTery (on the Esplanade). Note that there are also ART TOUR - Guided tour (search Playa Events), and self guided tours (paper copies) available at the ARTery. Most of the art on the playa is self-funded, so be sure to check out your favorite art projects on the Burning Man website now, and then help fund them or volunteer through their respective websites. It takes every single one of us to make Burning Man happen...
title: ART TOUR - Bicycle Tour
print_description: ARTery hosted bicycle tour of curated art projects, Temple and The Man.  Bring your bike and join the fun.  Departs promptly at 10 AM at ARTery.

description: It's all about the ART projects and the fabulous ARTISTS and their teams who create them! Ride in style on a bus/mutant vehicle as volunteers from the ARTery provide information on curated art pieces, as well as the Temple and The Man. Guided Vehicle tours run Tue-Fri and begin at 11:00 AM at ARTery (6:25 & Esplanade). Vehicle tours are for people with mobility issues -- seniors, pregnant women, people with ongoing or temporary disabilities, accompanied children, and others who might face challenges in getting out and around the playa. You must have tickets in advance to get a seat on the bus. Tickets are available @ 10 AM the day of the tour at ARTery (6:25 & Esplanade). Also there are separate ART TOUR - Bicycles (search Playa Directory), or DO YOUR OWN TOUR! Self-guided (paper map) tours available at the ARTery (on Esplanade)
title: ART TOUR - Guided
print_description: ARTery guided mutant vehicle/bus tours of the art.  For those with mobility issues, please.  Tickets given out at ARTery at 10 AM the day of the tour.

description:
*Be part of BOTH the BiGGEST gathering of BURNERS witH SOMBREROS on Playa and  take part in our funky BURNERS with SOMBREROS video... bring tequila and your AMiGOS!!! Arriba! Arriba!!

It is an undeniable fact: there are more sombreros than Mexicans on Playa! As a Mexican I just get giddy happy when I see my fellow Burners with colorful sombreros throughout Playa.... it simply evokes the festive nature of my culture: fiesta, spirits, baile, canto and some good food! I want to take it a step further and challenge 'cultural appropriation' stigmas out there by making it a WIN-WIN situation here: If you wear a Sombrero on Playa, you gotta KiSS A MEXiCAN! Come celebrate in the BiGGEST GATHERiNG OF BURNERS with SOMBREROS at Center Camp Cafe. Bring your SOMBREROS, your TEQUILA, and your AMiGOS... and together we'll go in search of MEXiCANS ON PLAYA and share the LOVE!!!

This year I am also gonna do something that IT'S SO OUT OF MY LEAGUE and make a ViDEO!!! SO come be part of the GIFT the GiVES and immortalize yourselves (and your SOMBRERO) in a funky video I got prepared for ya!! Arriba Arriba!!
title: BiGGEST gathering of BURNERS with SOMBREROS!
print_description: *Bring your sombreros and be part of  our funky "BURNERS with SOMBREROS" video......... bring tequila and your Amigos! Arriba! Arriba!!

description:
Biodanza has been baring hearts since the 60's. Developed in S. America it is now a world wide phenomenon bringing joy, pleasure, balance, health and healing through music, dance and sincere interaction. Contact and caress are tools of our trade. We deal in deep human intimacy, through touch, eye contact, movement and body language. Not verbal communication. We feel each other, letting the mind and its ways take a back seat for a change. We enhance our senses, our instincts and our state of consciousness. We perceive and experience ourselves and others differently when we do this. More authentically. More naked. 
The first hour is for interactive activation and expression, maybe getting a little wild together. The second half is for slowing down, relaxing, melting and harmoniously merging with one another, exercising the polarities of enhanced sense of self to oceanic experience.
title: Biodanza:  From Instinct to Inspiration
print_description: Interactive dance-movement-contact workshop to stimulate residual potentials in vitality-creativity-sexuality-universal love.  With Niraj

description: Bismuth is a metal with crazy crystalline properties. Apply heat and turn a featureless lump of dull grey metal into elaborate beautiful crystals. We'll show you how and you'll leave with a crystal of your own, supplies permitting. Mon-Fri 2-3pm

description: Geologist George Davis will give a full explanation of the chemical and mineralogical data from a playa sample inside of BRC in 2010.  Find out the good and bad things about playa dust. In addition, it's environmentally friendly and non-toxic. REAL 'Better living through chemistry' with a demo.

print_description: Geologist George Davis will explain what chemicals and minerals are in playa dust!  'Better living through chemistry' with a demo.

description:
Join Black Rock Solar at its annual event Solar Playa International. While sipping on a cool libation, you will get a chance to meet the staff and crew of Black Rock Solar as well as other Burners doing meaningful and innovative work around the country.  The purpose of this event is to bring together all of the different groups and individuals on playa doing work in renewable energy, climate change, environmental outreach, and policy.  Tell us about your projects and learn about ours. 

Since 2007 Black Rock Solar has been building solar arrays in Nevada and giving them away at little or no cost. To date, BRS has built over 5.5 megawatts of clean renewable energy.  BRS prioritizes installations for schools, hospitals, rural communities, non-profit groups, and Native American tribes.
title: Black Rock Solar’s Solar Playa International
print_description: Sip a cold drink, learn about Black Rock Solar, tell us what you’re doing in the world of renewable energy, climate change & environmental outreach.

description:
OMG! MUSIC WITH WORDS! Now in its 10th year on the playa, A Plus D bring BOOTIE BRC, the internationally-infamous bootleg mashup party, back to Black Rock City!

Bootie BRC celebrates (and satirizes) pop culture both past and present, keeping your brain guessing and body dancing with creative song combinations. Mixing and matching every musical genre, era, and style into one big dance party, it's the soundtrack for the A.D.D. generation -- with free mashup CDs given away like candy!

Launched by DJ duo A Plus D in 2003 in San Francisco, Bootie was the first club night dedicated solely to the burgeoning artform of the bootleg mashup, and is now the biggest mashup event in the world, with regular parties in several cities on four continents. Bootie BRC is presented in part by the BRC Weekly, Black Rock City's independent newsweekly. 

Bootie ... because one song at a time just isn't enough.
title: BOOTIE BRC 10-Year Anniversary Mashup Party
print_description: OMG MUSIC WITH WORDS FOR 10 YEARS! Dance to the best crazy mashups, celebrating (& satirizing) pop culture both past and present. Free CDs all night!

description:
Join us Friday for an annual event with details to come. Celebrating our growing presence at Black Rock City and the unique and special dynamic of the LGBTQ++ presence. Honoring the Gayborhood and it history.

Be sure and read http://queerburners.com/news/burner-history-x when you can. There will be new information added to it through the year as already so many accomplishments have been made.

Queer Burner History and Burning Man History are very telling in the development of our vie of the 10 Principles and how we have brought them into our lives.

We are celebrating the special flavor lgbtq burners have brought to Burning Man and our refusal to be simply integrated by radically express our specialness and invite everyone to join us on the journey; and let's invite everyone to join us in the celebration, too!

More details to come!!!!! Join the BRC Gay Pride Parade Facebook group and share in the discussion!
title: BRC Gay Pride
print_description: Join us Friday for an annual event with details to come. Celebrating our growing presence at Black Rock City

description:
A writing marathon is a magical experience for anyone who loves to write, and the playa and BRC provide a wealth of imaginative material. This model was based on Natalie Goldberg's concept in "Writing Down the Bones," and developed into a moving art form by the Southeastern Louisiana Writing Project. In brief: we choose a location, sit and write for ten minutes or so, share what we have written, and move on to another location. The only response we give to each others' writing is "thank you." 
We will likely depart from the Midway around 3:50 after we get ourselves organized and sit down to "write out the cobwebs." Participate for as long as you wish. Depending on interest, we may even publish our work online after the event. Visit writingmarathon.com to get a taste of how we do this in the Big Easy!
title: BRC Writing Marathon
print_description: Join us to write on the playa! BYO pen, journal, & wheels and meet at the New Orleans Sunken City Sideshow. Writers of all ages are invited!
other_location: Midway - New Orleans Sunken City Sideshow

description: Fear often gets in our way in realizing our life goals and achieving our highest potential. Fear sometimes get embedded deep in our psyche and will remain there until and unless we choose to address them. Granted it is easy to ignore our fears and stay in the comfort zone, yet imagine life's possibilities if we confront our fears. In this workshop, we will breakthrough our fears by breaking an arrow with our throat as a metaphorical exercise. It can be fear related to us growing up as queer individuals or any other personal fears that gets in our way to becoming our full two-spirit beautiful self. Participants must be sober to participate. Limited arrows available. Led by Blitzy.
title: Breakthrough Your Fear Closet (Arrow-Breaking)
print_description: In this workshop, we will breakthrough our fears by breaking an arrow with our throat as a metaphorical exercise. Limited # of arrows. Must be sober.

description: We'll be rockin' you out from 5am til Noon, Wednesday through Sunday mornings, with bubbly bass-tastic house music as you watch the sunrise over the playa and dance the AM hours away... and drink some bubbly while you boogie. We want to create a home of warmth and positive energy during the AM hours. Together with a team of artists, musicians, circus performers, dancers, planners, bartenders, builders, architects, thinkers, dreamers, and lovers, we are going to bring invigorating house music to the Burning Man community and a dance floor that gets everyone moving and shaking. We'll offer you champagne to relax and a comfy chill space to enjoy the sounds while resting your feet. We want to provide an environment conducive to connecting: spiritually, conversationally, and energetically.

description: Did you just spend a few hours setting up a dome? Then you should check out this new method of dome building that sets up in under an hour. Using the geometry of the truncated icosahedron, aka Bucky Ball, this dome frame features uniform pole lengths, isometric vertices, and a modified tensegrity system to stabilize and distribute loads. 15’-25’ diameter domes can be erected by two people in under an hour.
title: Bucky Dome open-house
print_description: Did you just spend a few hours setting up a dome? Then you should check out this new method of dome building that sets up in under an hour.

description: Experience this dynamic blend of contemporary yoga asana influenced by ancient martial arts. This Budokon Yoga series is a seamless transition-based flow with circular rotation and challenging dynamic movements, which brings grace, concentration, fluidity, power, and creativity to hatha yoga in an authentic expression. Intermediate/Advance level.
title: Budokan Yoga: Yoga   Martial Art
print_description: Experience the dynamic blend of contemporary yoga asana influenced by ancient martial arts in this seamless, challenging flow.

description:
Dr. Thelonious D. Rum and his Gypsies, Tramps and Thieves, each with their peerless pedigree, shall 
collude to captivate and inspire the naïve. Lured by the dark emotional caress of their own inner 
wisdom, not to mention the rhythm-making bait, (drums!) lying just beyond reach, players vie for a 
chance to build their own drum by playing 5 not-so-traditional Carnival games. They'll trawl the crowds,
 luring and enticing Burners with games of chance. This then shall determine who will be the lucky 
ones to express their creativity with skin, wood and rope. ALL candidates will be gifted with carny 
totems and icons, but only the courageous will stay and build a drum, those perennial souls who hurl 
themselves into the unknown of their personal darkness and light AND who aren’t too bad at tossing a 
ring.  * JOIN US any time during Midway hours, but the hours POSTED BELOW are ESPECIALLY auspicious 
today. (wink wink) Find our website here https://medicinalhealingexcursion.wordpress.com/
title: Build a Drum!

located_at_art.name: Dr. Thelonious D. RUM Medicinal Thump Thump Magical Healing Excursion

print_description: Build a DRUM with Dr. Thelonious D. Rum and Company but only after winning at the five games of chance and skill! Step right up! One at a time please!
other_location: On the Midway at the foot of THE MAN

description: Need a dashing accessory to complete your playa ensemble? Want to add some panache to an already excellent outfit? Never fear! Today you can stop by and decorate your very own, uniquely wonderful, tiny top hat with the lovely Bo Peep to guide you in all the most fashionable choices.  Be ready for the weekend with your stylish new accessory. Come early as supplies are limited.
title: Build a Tiny Top Hat
print_description: Add some panache to your costume with your very own, uniquely excellent, tiny top hat. Supplies are limited so come by early to make one.

description: All you need to defuse that bomb is... that foil gum wrapper you MOOPed this morning. Don't you wish you had a MacGyver Survival Kit? Stop by and get one - you custom stock it from our selection of extremely useful household objects, we tell you how to use them to fix a wide range of problems, on- and off-playa. (Guaranteed to defuse bombs or your money back.)
title: Build Your Own MacGyver Kit
print_description: Custom-stock a MacGyver Survival Kit from our selection of common household objects and learn to use them to fix problems on- and off-playa.

description: Wind UP after the bunny march and get wasted with the wizards! DJ H4ckrabbit will throw down some tunes, and there will be an open bar!
title: Bunny March Afterparty!
print_description: Wind UP after the bunny march and get wasted with the wizards! DJ H4ckrabbit will throw down some tunes, and there will be an open bar!

description: BURN2 is Burning Man's Virtual Regional out there on the net with real animated avatars in a simulated environment with real burners from all over the world.  Meet your BURN2 online friends. Bikeport yourself over and meet-up using your real-life avatar.  Enjoy a cocktail or mocktail but bring your own animations to this happy hour.  Never heard of us and BURN2 curious?  You're invited too.   BURN2 is a great place to decompress, precompress, and self-express your artistic side and your burner personality- all within the boundaries of the principles of Burning Man that you've come to know and love.  All the burn without the real-life dust.  Well, we do have dust storms on our virtual playa sometimes.
title: BURN2 Regional Member's Happy Hour
print_description: BURN2 Virtual Burning Man burners meet in their physical avatar on the real-life playa.  Landmark/Bikeport to  EBB and Glow Village happy hour.

description: Burners Bus Bike Bellhop Service will offer random newbs and rubes a lift for their luggage, coolers and tents from the Burner Express bus stop to their camp…or to some camp. We have bikes with trailers ready to assist you with your travel needs. If you arrive in Black Rock City on the bus we can help you transport gear to camp. Look for our cheerful grifters with their grubby hands and dusty grins as you get off the Burner Express bus in Black Rock City. Feel safe as you allow some complete stranger in goofy clothes to carry away all your possessions needed for the week, secure in the knowledge that there are 70,000 people for us... I mean... them, to get lost in. Burner Bus Bike Bellhop Service; A lot of Bs an S.
title: Burner Bike Bellhop Service for Burner Express Bus
print_description: Offering random newbs and rubes a lift for their luggage, coolers and tents from the BRC Burner Express bus stop  to their camp…or to some camp.

description:
The biggest collaborative game on the playa! 

Over 50 theme camps are participating in our game of Burner Bingo.

Visit Discordia to pick up a bingo card then visit the camps listed to complete challenges and get stamps. 

Return the card for daily prizes!
title: Burner Bingo
print_description: The biggest collaborative game on the playa! Get stamps from the theme camps on your bingo card to win prizes! Cards available from Discordia daily.

description: Energize yourself. Learn a 5 min routine of easy exercises to boost your energy health.
title: Burner Energize Thyself!
print_description: Energize yourself. Learn a 5 min routine of easy exercises to boost your energy health.

description:
Come join us on the Silicon Village stage for the first round of our Burner Family Feud!

We surveyed 100 Burners for their responses to our survey questions. Two teams of contestants (which could include you) will compete to pick the top answers and win prizes! Everyone wins as we find out more about our fellow burners!
title: Burner Family Feud
print_description: Come join us on the Silicon Village stage for our own Burner Family Feud!

description: Fashion! Lights!! Action!!! Show off your playa fashion, get exposed by a professional photographer in a timeless moment to keep for years to come.
title: Burner Portraits Studio
print_description: Fashion! Lights!! Action!!! Show off your playa fashion, get exposed by a professional photographer in a timeless moment to keep for years to come.

description: Make your own necklace medallion with a magnifying glass. Every day 10 to 2 at DragonAss Camp, in the Sac Valley Alley.
title: Burners Without Matches
print_description: Stop by DragonAss camp and burn one with us. We provide magnifying glasses and wood medallions for you to burn your own creation. Every day 10~2.

description: Like to speechify? Pontificate? Step up to ye olde soap box? We have you covered. While there's some jargon in here we admittedly don't understand, we assume Toastmasters folks will get it. Note:"If you’re a Toastmaster and couldn’t be in Vegas for their August International Convention, then bring your CC/CL/other manuals you’d like to advance in, and join us (with friends) for a real Toastmasters meeting - and photos! We plan to cram in speeches, evaluations, and table topics into a one hour session, or more if demand exists for it, so on time is a good thing. Prompt arrivals will have the best chances for the most fun and credit.Looking to join in? Cartoon Commune camp, Tuesday, 1-2PM.  Email: Gerflash (at) socal (dot) rr (dot) com. so we can plan ahead and count you in.Just maybe - the pix we take might make it into the TI Magazine! You’ll actually be Toastmastering on-Playa!
title: Burner Toastmasters Get Together and Speak-A-Thon
print_description: We’re back, so let’s do it again! Are you a Toastmaster? Bring your manual, friends. Join us for a great meet-up, photos, and fond memories!

description:
Get your pork on! Since we've got a bunch of foodies over at Camp Calico, including a professional chef, we figured it would be fun to share our culinary escapades with our BRC family! Come and enjoy a whole pig roast on the playa! We will be working on it all day, so stop by before to get a look at what we're up to, or just head over with your plates when you're ready to eat! See you there! 

WARNING: Pork sweats inevitable.
title: Burning Ham
print_description: Get your pork on! Camp Calico is roasting a whole pig on the playa. Bring your plates, it might get messy. WARNING: Pork sweats inevitable.

description: It is never too early to plan for the day when even Black Rock reaches capacity and the BLM finally pulls the plug. Fortunately there's lots of empty space in outer space, and nuclear fireworks can be the very best kind. Join us for a relaxed discussion with appropriate libations as we figure out if Mars dust is worse than playa dust, if cometary ice delivery is practical, just when a rocket is a Mutant Vehicle, and what to do when you're on the moon and people STILL complain that the music is too damn loud!
title: Burning Man 2100 Planning Party!
print_description: Come help us plan our burn at Tsiolkovskiy Crater or Olympus Mons, where there really will be space for everyone. (Bring your own oxygen.)

description: A deep exploration into the relationship between Burning Man and Buddhism.
title: Burning Man & Buddhism-Robert Thurman/David Kittay
print_description: A deep exploration into the relationship between Burning Man and Buddhism.

description: Confess your deepest, darkest secrets about the Burn and beyond to Madame Mysteria, or write your confession and put it in the Confession Box to be burned at the Temple. Will your penance be something naughty, or something nice? YOU DECIDE!
title: Burning Man Confessional
print_description: Confess your deepest, darkest secrets about the Burn and beyond to Madame Mysteria, or write your confession and put it in the Confession Box!

description: Run 31 miles around the playa with your favorite friends. We'll do a loop course, and there will be tons of fun! Bring a gallon of water and running snack to share as we run ourselves silly in the funnest place on earth. Pre-register here: https://ultrasignup.com/register.aspx?did=29683

print_description: Come out and run 50 kilometers-yep, 31 miles!-with the craziest on the playa! Bring water & snack. Run what you can. Register on Mon/Tues if possible.

description:
Our 11th year riding counter-clockwise around the esplanade. Meet at the 9:00 Plaza with your wheel and join our annual flock of Burning Man Unicyclists.
Off-Playa, connect with the Burning Man Unicycles Unite group on Facebook and keep in touch!

description: Announcing Burning Man's first ever Model UN! Debate BRC's biggest issues, like 'Shirtcocking: Respectable Attire, or Just Fucking Take Your Shirt Off Already', 'Dicks and Tits: Is Bigger Always Better?', and 'Turnkey Camps: Should they be Banned?' Prizes for master debaters and cunning linguists!
title: BurningMUN: Burning Man Model UN
print_description: Debate BRC's biggest issues, 'Shirtcocking: Respectable Attire?, 'Dicks and Tits: Is Bigger better? Prizes for master debaters & cunning linguists!

description: Kick off your week with a DIY button to commemorate the Carnival of Mirrors, or whatever you want. Create a unique button for yourself and a friend. We've got a prolific Badge-making machine for the magic to accommodate our materials, and you can add a photo or trinket for an extra special souvenir! Our able machinist will convert your creativity into a lasting memento for only you. Then pin your own, unique shwag on whomever. Light refreshments and other stuff are on us. Bring a cup!
title: Button Down Da Hatch!
print_description: Create a unique button for yourself and a friend. Materials provided, but you can bring a photo or memento for an extra special souvenir!

Button Experts, Button Machine and Art Stuff supplied ad libitum.

Button 4 You, Button 4 Me!

Let your Button enhance the entire Playa!

title: BYOUke
print_description: Come by with your Ukulele and share in some music and laughter at our BYOUke Workshop.  Learn a thing or 2...or 3 on this wonderful little instrument.

description: A Cabernet Cabaret! Come join us for this live musical showcase at sunset, where various acts of live music, burlesque, theater, & more will be presented. And want you! And your friends! And your little dog too! Bring a cup for some cabernet! Musicians, clowns, jugglers, contortionists, dancers, magicians, burlesquers... whatever your talent or joy! Or send your friends in our direction! Let's put together an ALIVE, energetic, sexy, silly show! If you can do something entertaining for 15 minutes or more, WE WANT YOU!
title: Cabernet Cabaret!
print_description: Come join us for this live musical showcase at sunset, where various acts of music, burlesque, & theater will be presented. Bring a cup for cabernet!

description:
Bonjour mes amis! Dine with us in our fine French Bistro. Let our glowing chandiliers and soft french music soothe your dubstep-addled soul as our waiters cater to your every whim. Perhaps you will try the escargot, non? 
Reservations can be made with our maître d' on playa and are recommended but not required.
title: Café Sŭrprïsé Dinner Service
print_description: Bonjour mes ami! Dine with us in our fine French Bistro. Reservations can be made with our maître d' on playa and are recommended but not required.

description: Perhaps you need a little something this afternoon, yes?  French fries, or as we like to call them Pomme Frites. 30 pounds made fresh, daily. Get them while they're hot.
title: Café Sŭrprïsé French Fries
print_description: Perhaps you need a little something salty this afternoon, yes?   French fries, or as we like to call them Pomme Frites. 30 pounds made fresh daily.

description: Wake up with a blissful dose of Live Music...yawn and stretch, breathe, meditate, set the course for your wonderfully, adventurous day. Calm Inside is designed to let you center your day, before all the hub bub and commotion...thumps thumps and sirens...the inescapable thrills of mayhem and delight. The Live Music will be of a more ambient, soul-filling, relaxation...happiness genre....so come and be at peace!!! After Calm Inside, enjoy our very popular Live Music Yoga in the Morning…where music meets the pose! On Wednesday and Friday, a portion of Calm Inside will include guided meditation.
title: Calm Inside
print_description: Meditate, yawn, stretch, and breathe to Live Music...set the course for your wonderful, adventurous day. Stay for the yoga class after...

description: Celebrate those inevitable wardrobe moments in style. All humps welcome.

print_description: Celebrate those inevitable wardrobe moments in style. All humps welcome.

description:
THE EVO ROOM is a portal taking you to the lifestyle you truly desire.  It is a fun way to practice personal growth and EVOLVE WITH FLAVOR. 

Once you step into THE EVOROOM, you are taken on a fun, transformative, and integrative journey to unleash your powerful potential and the unlimited possibilities awaiting you.

At the event, our featured guest speakers and lifestyle designers will share valuable tools and information to inspire growth in the areas of NUTRITION, PHYSICAL WELL-BEING, EMOTIONAL WELL-BEING, RELATIONSHIPS, and MONEY.

We've hacked the personal growth experience to accelerate the transformation process and made it more effective by making it easier to apply what you learn.
title: Camp Awesomeness - EVO Room Experience
print_description: THE EVO ROOM is a portal taking you to the lifestyle you truly desire.  It is a fun way to practice personal growth and EVOLVE WITH FLAVOR.

description: Join World Champion 'E' in learning the basics to this fast-becoming popular dance from Angola & Cape Verde called Kizomba. Kizomba is more like Tango mixed with other Latin dances like Salsa and Bachata. Whether you're a couple or alone, there's always room for everyone to learn the basics and show of some new moves in the playa or in the default world.
title: Camp Awesomeness - Kizomba Lessons
print_description: Join World Champion 'E' in learning the basics to this fast-becoming popular dance from Angola & Cape Verde called Kizomba.

description:
"An oasis in a dusty ocean of repetitive waves"
Come gather together and celebrate the true atmosphere of the desert. Celebrate the creativity born from the dust. Celebrate with music inspired by the playa that you can really (((feel))) 

Rather than recreating a default world 'nightclub', we summon a unique desert experience to stimulate the less mainstream dwellers of the dust )?( 

All Day / All Night - from TUES to BURN NIGHT (*with a special Surprise Party for Mama-M. on Burn Night) Come help us 'Surprise' her! 

Check at the camp on-playa for the most updated lineup of artists. *Also the Camp? website & alternate BM lineup outlets.

description: Come join Diva Nation for a night of Sexual Magic!  Cast aside your old hang-ups, self-doubts, and frustrations as we cast a circle to invoke and honor sexual deities from around the world and ask for their healing support both for ourselves and the world at large.  Our neo-pagan ceremony will take place in our interactive sacred art space called Sexual Babel which we welcome you to visit and be a part of at any time during the burn.  This is an opportunity to honor sexual deities and expressions of sexuality throughout history while increasing awareness of our personal relationships with sexuality for a hotter tomorrow.

description:
Come to our very own queerborhood carnival of smoothies and escape all those boring straight parties! 

The whole queerborhood is invited for smoothies, dance, whirl the rabbit wheel of bar fortune for a magical beverage of your choice, sexy gender blender games, toss the monkey make-out, and all around queer love fest. Special shout out to Glam Cocks, Comfort & Joy, Beaverton, Fe Boy Collective, Astropups, Stella, Suspended Animation, PolyParadise, ShamanDome, Yes Please, all the camps that were at the Queer Burner Summit, and all you other fabulous queer camps - if we didn't mention you please show up so we can mention you next year. Our goal is to create the largest ever and most epic queerborhood event. So come and enjoy smoothies and tails! All genders welcome always. (and don't worry if your straight but not narrow you are welcome too...besides by the time you leave you probably will be bent - that's right we recruit!). We will have both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.

description:
Build up your eco-consciousness for Playa life. We’ll show you how we reuse, recycle, repurpose, and redesign. See our solar cooker, rocket stove cooker, solar power, evapotron, and much more. Consider the Playa’s ecosystem, and the gear and food that are right for a trip into this world.Be ready for your next vacation with Mother Nature.	Nothing seems more natural than spending time in nature, but it’s easy to forget eco-attitudes when away from concrete cities.
     We’ll discuss prepping for a trip, being alert to pack only what we need: e.g., first aid kit, weather-appropriate clothing/gear, water & food. We leave packaging at home to minimize trash on-Playa. If we can, we pre-buy local fruit, veggies, and nuts; pre-make dishes and seal them in lightweight reusable containers. Reuse these to avoid disposables. We seal our food well, store trash, compost and recycle our waste.
We’ll be happy to hear your own ideas and consider them for additions to our Playa eco-practices.
title: Cartoon Commune Green Reflections’ Eco Camp Tour
print_description: Join us to see the eco-components of our Camp. Add to your eco-consciousness. See solar power, rocket stove, evapotron, and repurposing.

Bring your own cup to keep it so green, and enjoy your pleasure. Mix plenty of fun with a classic Cartoon Commune soiree of rock and roll dancing and good conversation as you meet new friends and old. A wide open dance contest just for the fun of it. We’ll have the music you like, light refreshments, and beyond. Guess what else? A few surprises to add plenty smiles.
title: Cartoon Commune’s Ninth Anniversary ’60s Dance
print_description: Enjoy ’60s oldies but goodies rock & roll, lite refreshments and more. BYO cup. Mix plenty of fun with a classy dance soiree, and then some!

description: Cartooning is a powerful art-form that can entertain and influence, but is simple to learn and accessible to all.  Come learn from a professional cartoonist to practice this expressive and enjoyable skill.  All skill levels welcome; you do not need to have any prior training or experience.  Learn all the basic skills like character creation, layout, composition, perspective, and comedy writing.  Brush up on advanced techniques like human and animal figure drawing, proportion, and color.  We end with an improvisational art game using the cartooning skills we've learned.  Supplies provided, or bring your own.
title: Cartoon Workshop
print_description: Anyone can cartoon! Learn & practice an expressive, enjoyable skill. Any skill level welcome. Learn basic/advanced techniques of a powerful artform.

description:
Castle Blocks provides you the opportunity to design and build your own brick castle or other structure using many large cardboard blocks.

You can satisfy your architecture or construction interests by building structures that may be original, that represent real world architecture, or perhaps one that is as tall as you can engineer.

More importantly, you can then share the artist's childhood by spectacularly toppling your structure with your friends after it's determined complete, which is sometimes a matter of varied opinions ...

Awards will be named in several categories based on photos you submit of your work and its destruction.
title: Castle Blocks
print_description: Build imaginative structures using 200 "castle" blocks.  Share a thrill from the artist's childhood by knocking them down spectacularly!

description: 35 year veteran railroad conductor and past boomer/hobo gives a tutorial on riding freight trains in the new millennium.  How to be safe on the rails, not get arrested, and enjoy a rugged adventure.   Hitchhiking sucks!   Freight trains don't go everywhere but they can get you far and fast toward your destination.  Having no destination is even better!   Learn what to carry with you, where to ride on a train, and how to keep a low profile.  Also learn how freight trains operate, where they stop, and how to find a 'friendly' railroad worker with whom to communicate.  Familiarize yourself with the 'Do's and Don'ts' of freight train hopping and discover the last shred of what real freedom means in America.
title: Catching Out:  How to Hop Freight Trains
print_description: Hitchhiking sucks!   Riding a freight train can be adventurous, but dangerous.  Learn how to do it safely and get to where you want to go.

description: Come play the adult version of Candyland...called Chakraland! The Chakraland game is a 22×30 foot vinyl flooring of a multicolored human sized game that participants play by rolling the giant dice and moving towards the different colored squares, each square representing a different chakra. The layout is similar to the child’s game “Candyland”. The squares will all have different quests written on them that need to be completed in a certain timeframe, or players have to go back to the previous square of the same color. There are some short cuts, wild pink squares, and black lose-a-turn squares. The winner makes it to the end of the colored path and gets loved up by the colorful game jesters. Yay, so much fun!

description: Join us in the Lotus Dome for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo (the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra). In the Lotus Sutra, Shakymuni Buddha revealed that every human being can attain enlightenment in their present form. Through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo, an individual is able to awaken this enlightenment the Buddha revealed and reveal their own Buddha nature. A practitioner of this Buddhism, through chanting and study, can transform their life and create a state of unshakable happiness, overcoming the sufferings of birth and death. Buddhism is a practice and everyone is welcome to join. Each day after chanting, together we will study a Buddhist concept, answer questions, and share experiences about the practice and its application to our daily life. All are welcome to join us. Novices, new practitioners, and curious souls welcome.
title: Chanting of the Lotus Sutra: Nam Myoho Renge Kyo
print_description: Join us in the Lotus Dome to chant the Lotus Sutra. Chant, meditate, reflect, and reveal your inner Buddha. Novices and curious souls welcome!

description: The Gayatri Mantra is one of the oldest known mantras in human history. It was forbidden to women for a long time. It is said that chanting the Gayatri Mantra purifies the chanter and purifies the listener, it removes all obstacles in our path to increase wisdom, happiness and spiritual growth. Come and chant with us this mantra for 108 repetitions. Why 108? It has been said that the number 108 has been a sacred number in the yoga world. We believe by chanting this mantra during Burning Man, you will find what you are looking for!
title: Chanting the Gayatri Mantra - 108 Repetitions

description:
There is a lot of hidden abuse in our country and only a few outlets that offer a safe environment and tools for healing. 
OmHuSaaRa went through a lot of abuse as a kid, both physically, verbally and sexually. He was able to find ways to overcome and heal  his trauma and the resulting PTSD. In this workshop, you will learn tools that help one overcome trauma or at least introduce one to the possibility of healing these wounds. 
 
Let's face abuse together and heal together as one. 
One person at a time.
title: Childhood Abuse & Healing Circle
print_description: A discussion and exercises for people to discuss past abuses: physical, emotional, and sexual. Held in the Chakralicious Temple Dome.

See if your brain remembers ‘that quote from that one movie, remember?? description: Circling (also know as InterSubjective Meditation) is an organic, in-the-moment interpersonal process that’s equal parts art form, meditation, and group conversation — all designed to allow a visceral experience of connection and understanding of another person’s world, celebrating who and where they are right now. It’s practicing using our genuine curiosity to better understand and become a connoisseur of another person’s world though present moment awareness while breaking through the assumptions and projections we have about each other.

description:
Money Shadows: Creating Abundance by Dancing with The Unconscious.
 
The Playa is a magical place where the gifting economy reigns. Yet, some of us spend big bucks preparing and getting to Black Rock City. So, even here money talks even if we pretend not to listen.
 
Still some of us struggle off the Playa with not  having enough,  wrestle with “it is never enough” or believe financial issues are too taboo to explore out loud, 
 
Perhaps for the first time, we will really listen to the voices we hear in our heads or the ones we don’t even know exist which block us from creating abundance and banishing scarcity.
 
So, in a safe and supportive environment come sing with your shadows, dance with the almighty dollar  and wake up to where you are financially   so you can return to your life away from Burning Man ready to make money your ally and not your enemy.
title: Clashing With Cash
print_description: Come ready to make money your ally and not your enemy. Move towards creating abundance while banishing scarcity. Cash Not Provided.

description:
It has happened to us all.  You're having a great time, easy and happy, dancing through the weeds of your own small life, and suddenly -- a clown.  He's trying to be funny at you.  He's a burlesque.  Or a Bozo.  Or a body comedian.  You can't punch him because that would be wrong.  You can't cry because you're terrified.  And you can't laugh because the life has been sucked out of you.  So you push it down, deep inside.  Where the clown trauma festers in its own silent and pressurized tank of suppressed rage and fear.

These incidents have been seen with increasing frequency as clowning has infiltrated our community.  Clowns are easy.  Clowns are anonymous.  Clowns are everywhere.  And clowns are dangerous.  They are the death knell of participation culture, just as the deadbeats were the death knell of hippie culture.  They embody the cheap, the quick, and the easy, and they should not be allowed to take over.

Come to our shaded bar and snack on our snacks with us.  Learn the story of clowns, past, present, and future.  Drink your health in a clown-free zone.  Crush the red nose of clown oppression.  And embed a new mantra into your soul: 

I will never be clowned again.
title: Clown Trauma Support Group
print_description: Clowns are anonymous. Clowns are everywhere. Clowns are dangerous. Drink your health in a clown-free zone. Crush the red nose. Shaded bar & snacks.

description: In this Carnival of Mirrors, it is easy to get lost in all the swirling colors and lovely distractions of all kinds. The Cleu pendant is a prize you won't want to miss, and the Cleu brainwashing is an ecstatic experience that is both relaxing and exhilarating.  To find CleuCamp, you may want to first visit the "Include the Cleu" labyrinth on the playa where you can walk the circles of the Universe, Earth, Life, and Consciousness. Look inside the magic box for a clue to our address. You may also want to find the "Clue to the Cleu" waystation kiosk in the theme camp area, another way to follow clues to our location. If you've never been to CleuCamp, you'll be glad you made the journey. Time to get dusty, playa pilgrims! Got a clue? We'll be waiting for you.
title: Clues to the Cleu

description: The Cocoon is sheer, stretchy enclosure made of colorful spandex and a zipper. From the outside, the Cocoon embodies architecture as a live, morphing sculpture, based on the forces of the body. From the inside, the Cocoon is a blank slate, out of which you have the freedom to create and stylize your experience. In order to go through great transformations, we must let our out-of-date stories die so a new paradigm can be born. In this workshop we will re-enact that experience of death and re-birth, emerging through a "birth canal" with the support and assistance of the group to guide us towards a transformed self.

description: Contradancing all levels to live music - looped/ traditional/ celtic/ fusion/ techno; fast-paced yet easy to learn with a caller who instructs (but with room for dancers to improvise). Half the moves are with your partner, half with everyone else, resulting in a tribal vibe, where the Zen is flow, synchrony, and bonding (not footwork, not competition). If you are smiling, you are doing it right.  Kid friendly.  Possible for many disabled.  No need to bring your own partner. Everyone who shows up should have a good time.

description:
Join us in the shade, From 1 until 3, Mon through Sat, for an Afternoon SnowCone Party at the Contraptionists Shade tents. Ride the IceCycle and make a blizzard of snow for all to enjoy while you await the frozen treat of Our choice.

 Kids to the front of the line, and Overly heated Kids may check for a Cooldown Cone if we have the Ice for them and chill in the shade during any overly heated hours and.
Children are always invited to the front of the line to cool quickly.

Guests who wish to power our human powered shaving bike may do so, so we may split the crystallized H2O into a fine feathery powder of flakes ready to fully accept the flavors of Our choice, and encapsulate them into the jewel colored crystals that are so desired by the weary travelers visiting our humble establishment and we know you will enjoy.

Come chill in our shade and check out the art and events schedule for more Contraptionists talks and activities.
title: Contraptionists Afternoon Snowcones.
print_description:
Join us in the shade, 1 to 3 Mon - Sat for an Afternoon SnowCone Party!
Ride an IceCycle and make a blizzard of snow for all. Kids front of the line.

description: Have you or your friends been naughty? Bring them by to be arrested and locked up in jail. Or, join our cop force, and help us find misbehaving burners. Our jail is open all day everyday, so bring your misbehaving friends by for the full locked up experience. Thursday is our special Cop Day where we patrol the playa streets all in good fun and humor. There is no shortage of burners that volunteer to get cuffed and arrested by our squad to get taken into custody.  The theme song from "CHiPs" and other old school, cop inspired tunes -- provides the soundtrack for our shenanigans.  As the Force travels from club to club we stop to issue citations for infractions committed by burners that demonstrate the need for "special guidance."

description:
"The Internet of Things: Poisoned at Birth by the Inkjet Printer Business-Model."

The computers that engulf your body (cars, planes, houses) and that
you insert into it (prosthesis, pacemakers, hearing aids) are subject
to a ridiculous Clinton-era copyright law that lets their
manufacturers lock them so that you can't use app stores or
replacement parts of your choosing -- but worse than that, to keep you
locked in, the law criminalizes telling you about flaws in the devices
that you depend on for life and limb.
The computers that engulf your body (cars, planes, houses) and that

description: Crossroads is back! Our epic live band is returning for our fifth year with the best live music on the playa, bar none! In that sea of EDM that swallows you on the playa we offer a soulful and funky alternative played by some of the best musicians, singers and dancers on the West Coast. Friday night we celebrate one the greatest artists of all time-- Prince! We will be celebrating our fifth year on playa by going back to our first year roots and throwing down the most awesome Prince jams of all time. Come sing and dance with songs that you simply cannot resist! We'll also be playing some of our greatest hits from previous theme nights! You won't want to miss it!  Before the show come enjoy our friendly bar and just hang out with the sexiest folks ever! Afterwards stay for delicious grilled cheese sandwiches served up in many tasty varieties by our village-mates MoonCheese!!
title: Crossroads Presents "Prince" - Epic Live Music!
print_description: Come get your groove on with songs by the one and only Prince! Our live 15-piece band of SF/LA's best is celebrating Year 5 by going back to Year 1!

description: Crossroads is back! Our epic live band is returning for our fifth year with the best live music on the playa, bar none! In that sea of EDM that swallows you on the playa we offer a soulful and funky alternative played by some of the best musicians, singers and dancers on the West Coast. Thursday night is all about getting your asses on the floor, so welcome to "The Club" our night of the best dance music of all time!! We know some of you love your EDM so we're gonna funk up songs by Disclosure, Bassment Jaxx, Depeche Mode and others and mash them up with the greatest dance hits of every decade of the past century by artists such as Missy Elliot, Janet Jackson, Outkast, Benny Goodman, Calvin Harris and more! Afterwards stay for delicious grilled cheese sandwiches served up in many tasty varieties by our village-mates MoonCheese!!

description: Couch Burners invite all Couchsurfers to our 5th Annual International Meat-n-Greet(formally the CS topless weenie roast)! As always, it is a BYO-share event. Bring something to cobntribute to the bar/grill and festivities. Booze, international meat(or faux meat) for the grill, a fact, or a great travel story. Meet other CSers, surf the BusSofas together, break in our human fooseball court, play some international games, and make new and lasting connections all over the world. Participate in making the world a better place... one couch at a time. See you there with love, lust, and playa dust!

description: Step right up, ladies and gents, children of all ages, for the best refreshment you’ll find in this entire Carnival!  Keep your peepers peeled for the palm trees and pink flamingoes which indicate you’ve discovered none other than the infamous Paradise Motel, where weary carnival goers are invited to stop by for the best snow cones in the world while lounging in the shade in our chill lounge while enjoying the melodic beats of our world class digital music purveyors.   This year, you’ll find as our roadside attraction none other than a purveyor of prognostications as a teller of fortunes has set up a tent where you can find out what your future has in store!  Our opulent Motel will also include a concierge desk where you can discover all the goings on in this most flamboyant section of the carnival.  Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice are always appreciated.  And as always, if you show your junk, you get to cut to the front (of the snow cone queue).
title: Daily Snow Cones at Paradise Motel
print_description: Enjoy a snow cone and music while lounging in our shade. Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice welcomed. Remember, if you show your junk, cut to the front!

description:
movement therapy that heals and frees physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages through ritual dance, breathwork, and contemporary Shamanism.
 a hands-on, physical experience of the ritual celebration.  The workshop begins with a ritual purification, connecting heart, body, mind, and spirit. Then it moves you into a deeper state of consciousness and closer to your individual and collective soul’s purpose. Utilizing dance, contemporary shamanism, hands on healing, drumming and global music, this powerful and beautiful soul work sheds inhibitions and heightens inner awareness in a safe and carefully monitored group setting. Dancers are blindfolded in the shamanic tradition and step beyond their conscious fears and limitations and allow their innermost creative sides to break free. Dancers tune in to sound and movement to take an inner journey exploring a trance-like state of self-discovery and self-realization.
title: Dance of Liberation
print_description: movement therapy that heals and frees physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages through ritual dance, breathwork, and contemporary Shamanism

description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what pushes people to the point of insanity; that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. It is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that citizens of BRC embrace. Our shows are an opportunity for Dark Sparklers and other BRC citizens to explore and showcase their Dark Sparkle through performance, storytelling, and tease. Featuring your favorite DS performers as well as guests from the BRC community. We'll also turn the tables with ample opportunity for participation. Contact: srodenburg@gmail.com
title: Dark Sparkle Burlesque Extravaganza
print_description: An exploration through performance, storytelling, and tease, featuring DS performers and guests from the BRC. Come ready to participate!

description:
We hunt dark and unlit burners in deep Playa and give them blinkies! BRING BLINKIES TO GIVE AWAY (I order 200 extra for my hunting adventures). Hunting party goes out at 8 pm. Join us at 9 pm to share your victories. My record so far is 50 darktards and 2 unlit police officers. 
Our prey are invited to become next year's hunters (asked to bring extra blinkies to give away next year). A true Darktard Hunter cannot help but hunt their prey throughout the event. 
Darktards are dangerous to themselves and others and MUST SEE THE LIGHT!
(Do not ask for handouts, this is a 'bring your own blinky' event)
title: Darktard Hunting

description: Talk by Ben Burningham, an astronomer with a penchant for remote sensing the atmospheres of brown dwarfs and giant planets. His talk will be about the difficulty of defining a planet which is directly related to his research and close to his heart. Discussion may lead into the mind boggling diversity of extra solar planets we’ve become aware of in the last decade.

description: Devi Flow is a strong vinyasa practice with elements of dynamic heart opening movements (mudra-asana-prana-bhakti dance) set to undulating world rhythms and the sounds of the ocean. Devi Flow is a power class that strengthens the core, uplifts the spirit, calms and focuses the restless mind.  Devi Flow is an evolution of intentional movement and yoga blended soulfully to ignite the warrior spirit. Using simple mudras, heart opening dynamic movement and a traditional vinyasa flow, Devi Flow awakens the inner warrior/goddess within all Yogi’s - while receiving therapeutic benefits from the practice. Together we will explore as a collective and express as individuals, creating harmony with breath, beauty with movement; all to the sacred heartbeat within unique original music and the sounds of nature.
title: Devi Flow Yoga w/ Juju Namjai
print_description: A strong vinyasa practice with elements of dynamic heart opening movements to uplift the spirit, calm and focus the restless mind.

description: Come participate in a sacred womens circle. Join together with your sisters as we explore the theme of violence against women and how to heal from trauma, find our voices and unite in our power. This particular focus is on recovering from violence and understanding the oppression of the feminine in this age. And by understanding that past we can more consciously choose our future as empowered goddesses. This class integrates group and partner activities, reflections and sharing, learning and movement, indigenous spiritual wisdom to help heal women.

She has over 25 years as a Global Movement facilitator and is the founder of 5Elements Dance Activation™- a powerful ecstatic dance meditation taking groups deep into the core of their soul, and transforming negativity into nectar! description: Back by popular demand, Enchanted Handjobs. Hand massage and tête-à-tête with camp ShangriLa are scheduled Sunday, Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 2-3pm. Discover the delights and deep relaxation of a hand massage. Coconut oil is used to lubricate and soften the hands while our mystic healers work away your troubles and cares using a combination of techniques along with the right amount of pressure. Last year over 100 attended and we had people literally purring in our hands. Stop by and explore this amazing treat for yourself at ShangriLa! You will receive and give a Handjob! The best free gift for you and your playa friends is a hand massage. Our hands do a lot of work from the minute we wake up until we go to bed. When was the last time you gave a loved one a gentle hand massage? It always surprises people when they discover the delights and deep relaxation of a hand massage. Come and explore this amazing treat for yourself and others @ ShangriLa!

description:
Greetings mortals, welcome to the world of Grignr the mightiest of barbarians. Come and join us on the Silicon Village stage for a group reading of the funniest and most terrible pieces of fan fiction ever produced... 'The Eye of Argon." Bear witness to the near impossible to read dialogue without bursting into laughter as other readers and members of the audience act out the scenes from this story regardless of inconsistencies, spelling errors, grammar errors, capitalization errors, tense errors, and made up words that make no sense! Do you have the stomach for dialogue such as this?

"The vile stench of the Shaman's hot fetid breath over came the nauseated female with a deep soul searing sickness, causing her to wrench her head backwards and regurgitate a slimy, orange white stream of swelling gore over the richly woven purple robe of the enthused acolyte."

If so come to the reading of the "Eye of Argon" written 35 years ago and has yet to be forgotten in the sands of time. The dialogue may seem impossible, but the terrible show will go on!
title: Eye of Argon - Comedy Reading/Group Performance
print_description: Join us at Silicon Village stage for a group reading & acting out of the funniest & most terrible piece of fan fiction ever produced, The Eye of Argon

description: Most gay men struggle with father issues. These wounds often prevent gay men from being completely intimate, often feeling rejected, not good enough or abandoned. It’s impossible to live authentically when your internal relationship with your father is compromised. This ritual serves to transform those wounds into sources of strength and compassion, allowing participants to fully embrace themselves, live authentically and experience deep, committed intimate relationships with themselves and other men. Led by Coop.
title: Fags & Fathers - Ritual/Ceremony for Men
print_description: This ritual serves to transform the wounds from issues with our fathers into sources of strength and compassion. Led by Coop.

description:
Ready to free yourself from all those playa aches and pains and find your inner alignment?  Feldenkrais is a gentle, subtle and effective approach to healing.  It helps with blood flow, the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. 

Be prepared to lay down, relax and attune to yourself as you are guided through gentle simple movement sequences guaranteed to shift your nervous system to a place of more serenity, comfort, and peace.  Please bring a mat or blanket if you have one.

A great way to rejuvenate your tired playa body!

print_description: Ready to free yourself from all playa aches & pains & find your inner alignment?  Feldenkrais is a gentle, subtle & effective approach to healing.

Kamp, established in 1999 using olive drab military surplus, will expand its noxious cloud to encompass a variety of interactive activities, workshops, gifting, and (f)art installations. Radio station K-F.A.R.T. at 107.3 FM will be broadcasting 24/7 its delightful, if somewhat tasteless transmissions, answering machine messages, and public service announcements.

description:
Here at Camp Make Good Choices we like to be inclusive. This year we will be doing a science fair for KIDS! We'll have snacks, drinks, and hands on science education. We'll cover several different topics and have interactive stations staffed with CMGC engineers and mentors! Given the breadth of ages, we'll do our best to cover as many age groups as we can with our science stations.
We'll also be screen printing a custom Science+Kids+CMGC graphic! Bring over a shirt or other material to receive the print! (cotton/poly blend is good and it needs to be fairly clean)

Parents, come over and take a seat. We'll chat with the kiddos for a while so have a refreshing adult beverage, relax for a bit, and get to know your friendly CMGC crew. (psss... we have a lot of adult oriented events as well, come back at 4 pm!)
We're commonly found in the 7:45ish area between B-D, but be sure to check the camp placement roster before heading over.
title: For the Kids!! Science on the Playa...
print_description: Bring the kids over for a snack, education & fun at our science stations, some tunes, a free custom screen print graphic, and take a load off!

description:
What makes a community visionary or transformational? What roles do these communities play in our lives? And how can we create models for sustainable growth in the digital age? 

In this talk Chris will explore the nature of visionary communities, both internal and external threats they face, and forward-looking strategies for their sustenance and growth. Chris will draw on his real-world experience organizing Palenque Norte and Psychedelic Society of San Francisco to highlight the opportunities and challenges ahead.
title: Fostering Healthy Visionary Community
print_description: In this talk Chris Pezza will discuss the nature of visionary communities and forward-looking strategies for their sustainable growth.

description:
My camp, the Free Photography Zone, has been doing portraits of the participants of Burning Man continuously for the past 19 years.  Each person, or group, is photographed in a studio setting and given an instant print as their tangible reminder of their Burning Man experience.  I then photograph then on medium format black and white film so that, if they wish, they can get prints at a later date.

These are not a re-do of your high school yearbook portrait just in Burning Man attire.  I try to give each person enough time to help me make a lasting photograph.  On our gallery walls in our shade structure there are black and white prints ranging in size from 16x20" to 4x5' that I hope will be of some inspiration to you.  Though I try not to duplicate what I have done in the past they may serve as a jumping off point for our photography session.  Not the easiest thing given the approximately 47,000 black and white negatives done so far.  I have never counted and see no reason to start now.

I consider the people I photograph as the most important part of any photograph and always try my best to make a photograph that will be of lasting value and interest well beyond the moment of its creation.

Come, join me, and together we may make something wonderful.  

I usually begin each day about 10 or 11 AM and continue into the night till I can't keep on my feet any longer.  Weather permitting I'll begin on Sunday August 30th through Saturday September 5th.

I do look forward to photographing you.
title: Free Photography Zone, Portraits on the Playa
print_description: My 19th year making portraits of the participants.  Get your print and be photographed in a real studio setting.  Every day and night.

What is this? A carnival of dusty disco balls? We’re not just here to clown around—we make the playa safe from dust so that all of the citizens and rubes of Black Rock City can breathe freely. Rendezvous with us! Please bring: feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, and any other useful cleaning equipment. 

You too can be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa—join us in uniform with your feather duster, surly attitude, and worst possible French accent.

On Thursday at 2:00 pm we meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward that dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!
