description: Whether you’re just coming back from seeing Daft Punk at the trash fence, or fighting off a giant hot dog in the Thunderdome, or maybe you just wandered around all night with your girlfriend in deep playa riding unicorns and doing karaoke with the Man (OK, you miiiiiiiight have something stronger than a brunch cocktail for that one)… how do you end your night or start your day?  That’s right! It's baaaaaaack! How hot can you take it? Spicy, savory, and DEFINITELY alcoholic, join us for even more bacon, even bloodier marys, and some lovely bottoms for all to view (ask before you fondle!)! Bring your own cup to Camp GTFO (location TBD) for the best*, hottest*, and TASTIEST* bloody marys and goodies on the Playa! . (* dustiest; let's not kid ourselves.) There are usually other food goodies available, as we see fit and depending on how drunk we got the night before/that morning. We'll also have our famous Hydration Station for those who aren't drinking or for those under 21 (because they can all still eat BACON, right?! Shush, it's a rhetorical question.) . Also revisit the ARE YOU A BLOODY PUSSY OR WHAT? bar, and see how hot you can take it when Gemini pours whatever the hell she damn well feels like into a shot glass for you to drink. Want to earn YOUR red wings?! Have a seat in our living room, dance the morning away in Tiny Club, play on the trampoline (clothing optional, of course!), or write in the shared journal! Bring your ID, bring your friends, bring your family, and BRING YOUR OWN FREAKING CUP!
title: Gemini’s 3rd or 4th Annual Bacon & Bloody Marys!
print_description: Join Gemini for the return of bacon, bloody marys, & bottom biscuits! BYOC! Toast a great night or a good morning! Hot, spicy & full of (s)ass.

description: We're offering an automated gift exchange service that distributes gifts among a web of people without the use of currency, middleman fees, credits, or barter. Participants can come and list what they want or may have to gift. If a participant doesn't have something, we'll provide a gift of their choosing. Then using a trade-loop algorithm a web of exchanged items is created that pairs participants with gifts they want. No bartering or haggling occurs because the person giving the gift is almost never the person the receiver exchanges their item with. Everyone gets something they wanted, the only "value" created is completely subjective to the recipient. For those who only wish to give, we photograph them and give their item's recipient their photo/information to potentially interact with later. Those without anything to give can still participate and will always receive something in the exchange.
title: Gift Exchange Bazaar
print_description: Want to make a gift economy work? Exchange gifts using a trade-loop algorithm with no hassling or haggling. No gift? No problem, we'll provide you one

description:
Small Camp Power Workshop
How to power your small camp (1 to 15 people). This information can also be applied for those emergency situations at home when you lose power for more than 8 hours or have an off the grid get-away place. The emphasis will be on:

- Determining your needs,

description:
Join in the ultimate confrontation of Good versus Evil/Super Heroes versus Super Villains. Bring your own nemesis or make a new adversary on the playa. A chance to dress in that capped costume or come as you are. Face the mirrored duality of human existence in this Carnival of life. Opposed and contrasted powers of human expression on either side. Without the superhero, what would a super-villain be? Each a reflection of the other, that necessary contrast identifying which mirror image is perceived to be true and good, while the reversed reflection is the hated other and evil. 
 Rally before the ABC Blocks for a possible dance-off, and then join your dedicated rivals and opponents for a nice casual stroll around Center Camp while sharing some quality inter-personal time with your sworn adversary, listening to your arch-antagonist and conversating away cataclysmic differences with your sworn blood enemy. End the this oppositional encounter with an optional stop at Center Camp where you can buy your adversary an iced coffee or maybe pick up an extra bag of ice to supply the lair of your nemesis. 
Good versus Evil.
Super Hero vs Super Villain.
Dark vs Light. 
Ying versus Yang.
Kirk versus Khan
Democracy vs Despot.
Costco vs Wallmart.
Live vs EDM.
Slut vs Virgin
Jeckle vs Hyde.
Apples vs Oranges
The Resistance vs The Empire.
Beowulf vs Grendel.
Crazy Horse vs General George Armstrong Custer. 
Lazarus vs Anti-Lazarus
Humanitarian vs Capitalist.
Allies vs Axis.
Salty versus Sweet
Jesus versus Satan.
Jazz versus Progressive Jazz.
MCs versus DJs.
Grilled Cheese versus Dusty Hugs.
BRCCP vs PnP.
title: Good versus Evil/SuperHeroes vs SuperVillians
print_description: Bring an arch nemesis, find one here. Join a capped costumed (or not) cataclysmic face-off/social mixer of mirrored adversaries in life's carnival.

description: Do you have Endo or know someone who does?  Join us for an Endo Support Group.  1 in 10 women have this horrible incurable disease which causes pain, infertility, scarring, and inflammation : You are not alone!  Come share your story, hugs, laughter, and tears.  We'll have books you may want to borrow and swag, too.  Wear yellow to support Endo Awareness!  Head to Horny Camp at Menagerie Village and ask for Prickly Pear (or look for horrible yellow leggings). See you there, EndoSisters.
title: Got Endometriosis?
print_description: Do you have Endo or know someone who does? You're not alone! Come share your story, hugs, laughter & tears. Wear yellow for Endo Awareness!

description: Paradise is a series of 26 poses. Most Yoga poses (asanas) are performed twice and held for a minute or 30 seconds. This creates natural heat in the body, the fire in the belly to create positive change, which allows the body to go deeper and safer into the poses. It eliminates the risk of injuries, promotes sweating and helps to release toxins. This class uses the same routine every time. Hot Yoga is a way to experience paradise on earth.

description: The art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki.  This performance was inspired by and arranged from the Japanese traditional tea ceremony. I named myself Hechi-Ken after the legendary master of tea ceremony, Hechi-Kan. The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please simply drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thought toward him for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me. Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- is always a great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy. I'll be happy if we could find any great idea to make better and more enjoyable future throughout this tea ceremony.
title: Hechi-Ken Hamazaki / Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD
print_description: I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me.A great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy.

description:
Let’s face it. It’s not only the exposed parts of your body that get sore, chafed and red from Burning Man, it’s also your nether region. Not being able to use baby wipes in the porta-potty and the endless hours biking in the desert take their toll.

The Uniformed Personnel at the Hiney Hygiene Station are here to help.

Our highly professional staff of “Hiney Hygienist” will use baby wipes, warm Shea Butter soapy water and Moisturizing Lotions with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, A, B5 and Minerals on your… Well you know what.

So why not let us “Pamper Your Posterior” at the Hiney Hygiene Station today?

description:
Tuesday rolls around, and you know where to be found! Homojitoville Happy Hour of course, with those drinks and that SOUND?!  Duh! You think.  You thirsty fool! Make your way down the street, and come dance and be cool! Our lovable bartenders will treat you with a smile, and pull that penis tap to drain the Homojito river Nile!  Many have come before, and all have loved dearly, but with our new Catwalk and Genie Bottle, this Happy Hour’s ‘bout to make HISTORY!  Clearly…
AND SHOULD YOU FIND US OUT AND ABOUT, we're impossible to go without. Because amidst the dust and in from the blind, our caravan begins to arrive. Our color is FULL, and our energy BRIGHT! Thank heavens it’s the Homos coming into sight! We bring with us drink, the most refreshing to be found; A Homojito we call it, better than ANY around! Its succulent tartness with fresh pulled mint, you’re sure to enjoy each and every sip. Come with us and clown! We’ll be all around town! You'll see the fur coming while sweet music abounds!
title: Homojitoville Happy Hour
print_description: Come and guzzle bottomless icy-fresh Homojitos and dance to music WITH WORDS as we rock Tuesday away! Bring us your cup, and we’ll fill it with love!

description:
Halcyon will share lessons and learnings from his grandpa, life, and the playa that will help recalibrate our hearts and realign our spirits 
Halcyon is a 17-year Burning Man participant and co-founder of Pink Heart Camp. He is the author of “Love more. Fear less.” and hosted the NBC.com web series “Fears. Regrets. Desires.” For over a decade he has hosted the Playa-inspired, Webby-award winning video podcast HugNation.com and frequently speaks about Gratitude & Gifting.
Halcyon is the co-founder of the San Diego-based “1st Saturdays” homeless outreach program and currently serves as Chief Wisdom Officer at a tech company in Ventura, California.
title: Hug Nation and Pink Ride- Halcyon
print_description: Halcyon will share lessons and learnings from his grandpa, life, and the playa that will help recalibrate our hearts and realign our spirits

description:
Wash and be Washed...Be part of an interactive washing experience.

The highly regarded and much anticipated... Human Carcass Wash!!!

Get involved with some of your closest Playa friends and some new friends in trading your old Playa Dust in for a clean body ready to be dusted once again. This event honors your stated boundaries of where you do want to be touched or washed.

You will first participate in helping other Burning Man friends get washed by spraying them with Water, Dr. Bonners Peppermint Soap, washed with plenty of hands by your Playa neighbors, then sprayed again with water and squeeged off before you depart for more Playa fun. Bring a water donation to help the process along.

Hair washing may be available, depending on donated water resources and available PolyParadise members or other Playa friends willing to provide Hair Washing.
title: Human Carcass Wash

description: Come share your immigration story at Que Viva! camp. At Burning Man, everyone is an immigrant. No matter what city/state/country/planet you came from, we want to know how you got here. Use our video booth to record your migration/immigration story and add it to the archive. At night, we will play back the stories from the archive, projecting them onto the playa in front of Que Viva! for passersby to enjoy. Story tellers will receive an official Black Rock City permanent Residency tag.
title: Immigration Story Video Booth
print_description: Come share your immigration story at Que Viva! camp. Story tellers will receive an official Black Rock City permanent Residency tag.

description: The Very First Burners: Traditional Ecological Knowledge and the Indigenous Use of Fire in the Black Rock Desert - The concept of "Pristine" or "Untouched Wilderness" is an outmoded look at nature. Native Americans have traditionally used fire to control and maintain the landscape since the dawn of time. Fire has been used to increase the yield of wild crafted harvests, hunting practices, and the control of watershed resources. Archaeologist Clare Burns will explore ways that we can incorporate this traditional ecological knowledge to increase the productivity of our natural resources based on models that our local Native Americans have used for centuries.
title: Indigenous Use of Fire in the Black Rock Desert
print_description: Archaeologist Clare Burn will discuss the Very First Burners, Traditional Ecological Knowledge and the Indigenous Use of Fire in the Black Rock Desert

description: If you could make love with Spirit/The Divine: how could it happen? how would it feel? what would result? whom would you trust and ask to assist and/or to guide? where could this happen? when would you be ready? what is holding you back? Prepare yourself to make love with the Divine. Discover ancient techniques that lead to a deeper awareness of your own self, and ways to greatly expand the connection with your lover. Move deeply past the surface sensations, as you explore the unions between your minds, emotions, spirits, sexualities, and body temples. Go for the "full being orgasm", the sacred erotic dance that expands and transports you both to unimaginable ecstasy. This is a clothing-optional, contact-optional workshop for couples of all genders and orientations.

Bring your beloved and learn how to connect with the Divine
within each other. For in the dance of two, we become one.

description:
Jamrunner is a "Journey to the End of the Night" styled game (ie: zombie tag, spy tag). 

Between evading pursuers, there is an interactive story that will unfold the longer a player remains in the game. The more resources I have available to me, the more enriched I can make this experience. I will need LOTS of printed materials, including maps and dossiers.

If you'd like to join (or know a person/camp who can help) let me know! See below for details.

The story:
Businessman and Nevada oligarch, Randall "Buck" Thurlough, is about to deal a deathblow to decommodification at Burning Man. The Order of Greywater Cockatoos is waging a subversive campaign against this corporate takeover. You are a member of this underground movement led by the elusive culture jammer, Darwin Sandiego.

Be careful! Thurlough's influence has grown to the point that he has successfully installed his own hired muscle at the festival. Private contractors of the notorious Pike River Security Firm roam the playa. If they catch you, they'll coerce you into turning on your fellow operatives.
title: Jamrunner
print_description: Jamrunner is a "Journey to the End of the Night" styled game (ie: zombie tag, spy tag). It starts at the Duckpond!

description:
Oasis 47 is very fortunate to have a unique body worker and healer trained in the art of Karen Burmese healing.

Ron Hod is one of only 3 non-Karen practitioners of Karen Burmese healing techniques, and has been practicing for 14 years. The church leaders who once offered the training no longer do so, so further training can only be achieved in Thailand or Myanmar (Burma). Ron is initiated, attuned, and aligned in the Karen Burmese art of Opendove Form (/Open Dove Form) modicum, a system of energy and body work that dates back over 1,700 years. Ron was recently realigned to the specific energy specifications required of practitioners,
title: KAREN Burmese Massage and Intitutive Bodywork
print_description: A unique form of intuitive massage and bodywork originating from Burma which dates back 1700 years. Ron is one of 3 non-Karen people who can practice.

description:
We'll have two classes explaining and demonstrating on how to throw a knife. Part of the explanation will be on why this is NOT a martial art and why, despite what you've seen in the movies, no one in their right mind would ever throw a knife at a person. It should be thought of as more of a form of object manipulation, like juggling.
  We'll have one knife throwing wall and a number of floor boards for familiarizing yourself with the weight and balance of the knives. We'll have knives for practice but feel free to bring your own. Classes are Tuesday and Thursday 10:00 - 12:00

description:
Let Kostume Kult transform you with a new costume or accessory! Costume experts dress you & send you dancing down the runway. Silliness guaranteed!

Tuesday through Saturday from Noon until 5:00pm Black Rock City citizens can jump on the "K" (subway) Train with its outrageous ads and colorful graffiti to arrive at the platform of Koney Island’s best kostumery – the closed down mysterious K Station.  Kamp Karneys assist folks as they morph themselves with over TWO TONS of costumes. Exit through the gift shop onto the runway where burners strut their newfound finery rebirthed onto the playa - ready to participate with extra attitude. From the raised dance platform watch the daily fashion shows and ongoing esplanade carnival. Loved by the paparazzi and Cheered on by subway straphangers, live DJ music, and the infamous ring master MCs, citizens can show their freaky side on the runway under the watchful eye of the 25' tall King Kong. Hanging from the Empire State Building, even Kong gets his freakshow on with his Guinness World Record 45' pink tutu (Tutu Tuesday) and BRC Animal Control bling.
title: Kostume Gifting Experience
print_description: Let Kostume Kult transform you with a new costume or accessory! Costume experts dress you & send you dancing down the runway. Silliness guaranteed.

description: Do you want to try something completely new? We’re all looking for ways to have experiences that really rock our world and awaken our senses! Here’s your chance to experience something we guarantee you’ve never felt before! Eros Tangeré is a one-on-one “tactile performance” that can only be described as a sensation experience that is created as your very body is played as if it were an ever changing organic musical instrument.  Your body becomes the surface upon which amazing erotic sensations will cascade with the undulations of an amazing music track and scent. Imagine that you can FEEL the expression of music with your body. Shed of your clothes, you lay prone and robbed of your sense of sight, one of our artists will perform upon your body with the music in ways that you have never experienced. This is a unique and creative custom designed sensory performance. Not for the faint of heart. Eros Tangeré is a one on one, sensual adult event. Space is very limited so signing up for a session prior to start time is highly recommended. Check in at the Camp for Sensual Pleasures inside Spanky’s Wine Bar for more info and times. 18+, Ladies Only. This has become a hit-favorite at Burning Man, do not miss it. Appointments are limited.
title: Ladies: Eros Tangeré Erotic 1-on-1 Sensation

description:
Last Bar on Earth or First bar on Play, depending on which way you reach the trash fence. Located along the fence, like a mirage looming in the distance, out of the desert, from the dust: Ice Cold Margaritas. The Last Bar on Earth, past the Esplanade, past the Man, past the Temple… as far as a person can go in Black Rock City.
…or…
The First Bar on the Playa; depending on which way you are coming to the bar. For those trekking across the barren wasteland, evading the dozen or so security and law enforcement agencies, avoiding detection by radar and heat sensors, struggling to finally reach the perimeter fence; our Bar is there to offer you an ice cold beverage and welcome you Home with a hug, brother/sister, before contacting the proper authorities and turning you over to security.

For several years I have rode my bicycle with trailer out to the furthest point in Black Rock City with all the booze, juice, water, soda and ice I could fit in the 3 large ice-chests. I purposely set up at the remotest spot I can find, away from camps, sound systems, art vehicles and crowds.  Trying to provide a service to intrepid playa explorers, people out riding bikes along the trash fence, those reaching beyond the EDM to see the desert vastness. As they spot our stack of coolers along the fence, in they trickle and find Iced Cold Margaritas waiting for them. Every year we go through every drop of beverage we can carry out there, usually in under an hour or two. Hosted by Camp Threat.

Bring a cup and witty banter. Join us at the fence.

And, YES, most definitely, Daft Punk will be playing.
title: Last Bar on Earth/First Bar on Playa
print_description: Last Bar or First, depending on which way you reach the trash fence, our mobile bar will be there to quench your thirst with ice cold beverages

description:
Laugha Yoga is an ancient yet
new idea of combining the practices of yoga,  prolonged intentional
laughter and Radical Forgiveness. This combination is extremely potent
and effective. This dynamic practice energizes, enlivens and brings us
greater confidence. Laughing Yoga has many health benefits among which
are a boost in our immunity and lowering stress levels. Forgiveness is
an ability we can develop to renew our relationship with our self and
others. Laughter is a by-product of the joy and heightened sense of
interconnectedness.
title: Laughter Yoga
print_description: Laugha Yoga is an ancient yet new idea of combining the practices of yoga,  prolonged intentional laughter and Radical Forgiveness.

description: Start your evenings with the most intense laughter you can experience. We laugh for no reason, other than for exercise, and health. Relieve stress and pain, promote natural healing, and create spontaneous bonds of friendship through group laughter. It’s fun! The brainchild of Dr. Madan Kataria in India and practiced by millions worldwide, Laughter Yoga combines Unconditional Laughter with Yogic Breathing (Pranayama). Anyone can Laugh for No Reason, without relying on humor, jokes or comedy. Laughter is simulated as a body exercise in a group; with eye contact and childlike playfulness, it soon turns into real and contagious laughter. The concept of Laughter Yoga is based on a scientific fact that the body cannot differentiate between fake and real laughter. One gets the same physiological and psychological benefits. Find much more info online by searching on Laughter Yoga, but come! Enjoy!
title: Laughter Yoga
print_description: Laughter as exercise! Laugh with others in childlike playfulness; experience the health benefits of a good, long laugh!

description:
" An introduction to human energetic system and how the ancient mystical traditions of India, China, and Europe interweave to create the foundational elements for an integral spiritual practice - the control of the human vessel through postures (asana) + breath control (pranayama)  + mental focus (mantra). Includes 2-hour physical practice of Qigong & Yoga that will prepare you for the burn.

There will be an explanation of Traditional Indian Medicine (Yoga/Ayurveda) and Traditional Chinese Medicine (Qi Gong/Taoism), two ancient healing systems over 2000 years old. There will be an exploration on the difference between the Indian Hinduism (Polytheistic) & Chinese Taoism (Monotheistic) theories and how we can integrate these two philosophies into our daily spiritual practice to empower ourselves.

The discussion will then be followed by a 2 hour Yoga & Qi Gong class which will blend together the elements of ancient India (Yoga) and China (Qi Gong) to provide a dynamic moving meditation focused on providing a balance of both Yang (active) and Yin (passive) elements, that will conclude with a healing Yoga Nidra (conscious deep sleep) meditation - leaving you empowered, focused, and energized - ready for the burn and the new year. "
title: Life-Force Dynamic: An Exploration of Human Energy
print_description: An introduction to human energetic system using Qigong & Yoga that will prepare you for the burn (bring a yoga mat or towel) with Matthew Winke.

description:
Joey Chang aka CelloJoe is the world's only beatboxing, long distance bicycling, looping cellist.  He is the wildest beatboxing cellist in the west. By combining cello with beatboxing, he has created a unique genre: Classical Hip Hop. 

CelloJoe records live on stage with a loop pedal and produces intricate tapestries of harmony, melody, and rhythm. His beatboxing (vocal percussion) and funky cello grooves form a rich soundscape for intelligent lyrics and his music spreads love, joy, laughter and conscious vibrations.

description: The sun’s just up, but not too hot; clothing is optional here, so adults only, please. Come for an early hour of low impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 low-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, and vitality, and open your points and channels. Bring your water or hydration liquid. We’ll provide sticks for you. Master Mai Bac Dao developed Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of war of the North Vietnamese. He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain health through LSA, and vowed if he was ever freed, he’d dedicate his life to spread its benefits, with the proviso that no trainer could ever charge for it. (Like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, moved to Southern California, and taught classes of students and future teachers. Today, weekly classes abound in So Cal, around the US, and the world.  See: www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 .
title: Longevity Stick
print_description: Sun’s up, not too hot, clothes optional. 1 hr of lo impact exercise for balance, open points, channels. Bring H2O. We’ll provide the sticks!

description: I am a  woman who has focused herself over the last year on providing empowerment to already successful male entrepreneurs and thought leaders, supporting the purity of what legacy they leave behind by helping them with everything from how they deliver who they are to the world, to working out their heart and personal logistics, I have developed the "50 Points of Attractiveness" and tested it to success. I have 18 years coaching authentic self-expression, including 4 TEDx talks. 22 years studying people / human interaction via songwriting (and expressing my findings artfully). 28 years as a performer in various capacities, especially singing. In my career I've presented music and talks for over 100,000 people. Also, I've spent the last full year doing a deep dive into femininity/polarity studies. I am an advocate for men being empowered (especially as women claim their power more and more), and attaining the capacity to leave legacies. This includes knowing how to navigate matters of the heart. Overall, I really LOVE showing men how to feel happy and free professionally, publicly, and personally by learning how to express themselves authentically. So much of this revolves around a man's ability to limit drama and distraction in his life.
title: Men's Authentic Personal Expression
print_description: What is needed for men to be happy and free, personally, professionally, and publicly? 18-year Authentic Public Speaking coach reveals findings.

description:
When: Monday, August 31 from 5:45 - 9pm
Where: from Everywhere Pavilion to the Man

Come one, come all, step right up!  All are invited to the Grand Opening of the Midway! Engage with our global community and discover the exotic delights of our carnival sideshow around the Man.
The festivities will kick off with a grand parade procession starting at 5:45pm at the Everywhere Pavilion at 6:15 and Esplanade and leading into the Midway at the Man Base, where our opening party will begin at 6:15 pm. Performers of all stripes invited! Performances and shenanigans await!

description:
I woud like to instruct 90-minute yoga sessions with an intention of self-exploration. I do not see myself as a teacher, rather a facilitator who
supports other people's journeys. I allow people room to be present and feel into their bodies, in that each posture is held for an extended period of time. It is not about appearances, our neighbors, the next posture. Each session would include an intention of focus that I would explain before beginning. What is more than being present? Presence itself.
title: Mindful Hatha Yoga with CC
print_description: Back to the body: An Iyengar-inspired Hatha yoga class including pranayama (breath work). Both beginners and advanced practitioners welcome!

description:
Mind Melt lets your mind be changed from Fear of the unknown, to finding Hope in the Future, by experiencing 3-D Images of lights and sounds and the peace only found within the receptive mind and experience of every thought, feelings, sensations, and level of awareness through corresponding brain wave patterns.

Mind machines change your perception by stimulating balanced, abundant neurotransmitter production, expanding neural pathways, and programming desirable, ecologically sound behaviors. The use of mind melting can enhance physical healing and homeostasis, intellectual performance, and greatly improved a sense of well-being, which allows one to See beauty where others do not, and a new perception of life that is the Future for all Mankind.

Remember; nothing really exists, it’s all in the electrons of your mind.

description:
Do you wish there were some middle-of-the-night place where you could grab a seat and let your mind be doubly warped? Liminal Labs has you covered! After dark, all night long starting at 9:15, Tuesday through Friday, we invite you to Mirror Movie Mashup, where daring cinephiles grab a seat and watch TWO movies at once on our luxurious 53 foot wide double screen / trailer! Think of it, BARBARELLA & LOGAN’S RUN! THE HUNGER & ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE! DUMBO & CAROUSEL! REPO MAN & PULP FICTION! ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK & THE WARRIORS! STAR WARS & STAR TREK! Or talk us into showing your own mirrored movie picks from our extensive roster of fine films, tv shows and ridiculous youtube videos. All this and free popcorn, too!  No playa cinephile will walk away unsatisfied.  A roster of movie pairings is available at: http://www.zorca.com/liminallabs/mirrormovies or goo.gl/pJy4Fh

Also, do mornings on the playa find you a little dazed and hazy? From 11AM-1PM on Tuesday - Saturday, we happily throw open the Liminal Pharmakon where you are invited to choose from an apothecary menu full of salubrious nostrums, elixirs and vitamin-rich restoratives.
title: Mirror Movie Mashup and Popcorn by Liminal Labs
print_description: All night long starting 9:15 T-F, let your mind be doubly warped watching 2 movies at once (i.e. Barbarella vs. Logan's Run). Schedule: goo.gl/pJy4Fh

description: Unlock the heart, the mind and begin your playa day with us.  Jhana will lead a morning meditation session based on True Meditation by Adya Shanti from the Bay area.   This is a meditation method that honors primordial silence that is within us.  No fancy mantras or visualization techniques or lotus position required.  All we need is our sincerity and willingness to close our eyes, breathe and surrender.  We will dive deeply into the collective silence allowed by the group and gain new perspectives and vantage points in life.  Come join us and let go of the things and ourselves that hindered us.
title: Morning Calm Meditation with Jhana
print_description: Unlock the heart, the mind, and begin your playa day with us.

description:
Dancing with the Mind of Meditation
This Contemplative Dance workshop offers you an introduction to a variety of movement meditation techniques. We'll sense and feel the way that energy moves through the body with Qi Gong practice. We'll explore somatic training and the Body/Mind practices of Developmental Movement and Experiential Anatomy. We'll investigate our relationship to form, space, and each other through Viewpoints Space Awareness and Mudra Space Awareness. 

This class is a laboratory where we'll be working with the energy that animates our bodies. We'll be exploring how energy moves when the body moves and how mind can direct energy. We'll learn to harness the power of the breath and focus of the mind to attain higher performance outcomes.

The work is toward attaining a greater depth of expression of personal energy, achieving grace and ease in a variety of movement patterns, developing an equanimity of all body parts as initiators and supporters of movement in space, and gaining the ability to dance ecstatically with great amounts of energy without loss of awareness of where you are and what is around you. 

Everyone is welcome from dancers seeking to bring contemplation into their dance - to those wishing to bridge their sitting practice to their walking meditation practice to the rest of their active lives - to people who have never danced or meditated before.
title: Moving Meditation Contemplative Dance
print_description: An introduction to Mind/Body practices. Sensing Feeling and Action. Experiencing the body. Qi Gong energy work. Space Awareness.

description: Paul Stamets will put the co-evolution of fungi and life on this planet into perspective and unveil the research that he and his team have conducted which makes a strong case that, by pairing with our fungal friends, we can restore habitats, clean water, support and renew foodwebs, and strengthen ecosystems at a time when habitats and humans are in collision.

print_description: Paul Stamets has research to show that pairing with our fungal friends, we can restore habitats, clean water, renew foodwebs and strengthen ecosystems

description: A wandering neo-psychedelic folk singer, multi-instrumentalist and genuine song and dance man singing inter-dimensional songs steeped in American blues, soul, funk, old timely, freakfolk, gospel, and big beat rock n roll and and performing with a kind of generosity and sincere breadth of emotion all too rare these days. The result is a kind of hypnotic feel good music that holds the ability to transport us through calculated sound, emotion, words/story.... to that warm feeling of coming home into this electric moment, the ever present and infectious NOW!

description: Since 2004, hundreds of burners meet at the Man and pedal off into the City for a few hours of bar hopping and good cheer! Multiple host camps will have bartenders standing by with icy libations prepared exclusively for the riders. This year’s host camps will be Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Duckpond, Cubhouse, Gaylactic Village, and Celestial Bodies, culminating in a legendary afterparty at Comfort & Joy hosted by a team of talented bartenders wearing nothing but hospitality. If you’re willing to meet the dress code, join us for one of the goofiest parties on the playa. We aren’t making a statement or pushing an agenda; we’re just riding our bikes, drinking some cocktails, and making new friends.  Oh yeah, and we’re naked.  Mugs for the first 500 riders (and yeah, we always run out). Cheers!
title: Naked Pub Crawl
print_description: The name says it all. Host camps will have bartenders and icy cocktails waiting exclusively for us. Mugs for the first 500 riders. Our 12th Year!

description:
Want to color up? Come by our colorful RV, brush and finger paint up any and every part of your and your friends bodies with body and MOOP safe paint.

We humans come in so many flavors, with such awesome variety! Join us as we decorate our bodies and visually proclaim who we are. With just a few splashes (daubs) of colorful paint, our living canvases become incredible expressions of our unique version of “human”, our personal “performance art.” Its a delight for the senses - especially touch - feeling brush or finger strokes over your skin can be a very sensual experience.

We will offer printed photo postcards to send a picture of your body art home to your friends, family or yourself as a fun memory.

print_description: With a few daubs of colourful paint our living canvases become an expression of who we are. Painting and being painted can be a sensual experience.

description:
Imagine, you’ve just met someone you’re highly attracted to. You’re having a wonderful conversation and you feel the excitement building in your chest.  You’re at the point where you know you want to take it to the next level. It’s the moment of no return. This moment of tension is both one of the hottest moments of attraction and potentially one of the most awkward.  

How do you know if the other person is at the same desire level? How do you assess their openness to touch, to a kiss, or more? A kiss or initial touch is relatively low stakes, but what happens when things heat up? What happens when you’ve just overstepped a line and can feel their withdrawal?  

These nuanced moments of initial sexual attraction can be the hottest of our lives. But we’re never really taught how to navigate highly sexually charged moments with someone completely new.  What does it mean to fully take responsibility for these moments so that when we’re done everyone involved feels totally awesome?   

In this workshop you will get a much deeper understanding of the nuances of initiating and negotiating hot and sexy connections. 

-Boost your sexual self-confidence
-Know how to feel your “fuck yes!” and your “Oh no!” and everything in between.
-Understand when and how to bring up "the conversation" so you don’t deflate all the sexual turn-on!
-Gain clear sexy communication skills to keep it hot while still conveying important information.
-And learn the number 1 reason why these skills will make you the sexiest person on earth!
title: Navigating Altered States & Ayahuasca
print_description: Meriana will share tools on navigating altered states of consciousness & Aya which will enrich your psychonautic tool kit & empower your inner shaman.

description:
The Back Alley Cinema (located appropriately enough behind the Black Rock City Self Service Abortion Clinic) has been providing literally dozens of burners with nightly entertainment, intermittently, since 2009.  Now a part of the Cult of the Magic Lady!

Come plop yourself down on a couch... or on a fellow burner... or on a fellow burner ON a couch..  Enjoy fresh popped corn in the middle of nowhere.  Programming varies but, with a library of terabytes of entertainment onhand, is bound to be... entertaining to someone.  Bring a friend!  Or two!  Maybe even three, but let's not overdo it, we usually don't have THAT much room.

Everyone has to grow tired of nonstop raving now and again (I think... Do you?  Honestly, I wouldn't know... Never really was my thing...  Which is why I run a theater... in a desert..  Oh crap, I think I may have gotten off track...) so take a night off and JOIN US...

Free intoxicants for the kids!  (No, not really... I'm actually just amazed at how many characters I'm allowed to type in this section...  Really.  I've only just passed the halfway point.  Isn't that nuts?  How are you to be expected to come up with so much to say, really...?)

Previous nights have included: Dude Night (Tron, The Fisher King, The Big Lebowski), Musical Night (Repo: The Musical, Tommy, Suck)... Some nights we don't even HAVE themes!  (Because, you know... Burning Man...  Plans vaporize!)

So be sure to visit us at some point in your travels.  You can also get yourself loaded at the Koi Lounge, and of course HAVE AN ABORTION... Or two... Or three! (You slut, but we don't do shame because.... What's the point?)
title: Nightly "Celluloid" Debauchery - Back Alley Cinema
print_description:
"Live people ignore the strange and unusual..."  Why be like them?
Nightly double/triple features of cult/oddities/what-have-you... POPCORN!

description: Nurturedance is a movement form that provides methods for making safe, loving, and nurturing connections between people. By holding, rocking, and cradling each other, a direct path is formed to deep and visceral experiences of nurturance. Some of the movements we do induce mutual trance states by using repetitive circular motion. A hug that evolves into a spiral that is so safe and supported that we enter graceful states of consciousness. If you are looking for ways to enhance your relationship with your partner, this may be useful. Relating in non-verbal, non-linear fashion can have an effect of breaking through barriers of relating on new and different levels. People report that using these methods deepens and re-invigorates their relationship.
title: NurtureDance
print_description: Make safe, loving and nurturing connections in dance by holding, rocking and cradling eachother

description: we're very excited as this will be Playfully Yours 14th year on the playa. We have expanded our play area with more than doubling the size. We offer an outdoor play area, a covered open area, and new to our camp, an enclosed area offering privacy out of sight from passerbyers. We invite everyone but especially beginners and those curious about BDSM play to come and play in a safe, non-pressured, and supervised environment to learn and experience dungeon play. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we focus on the lighter, more sensual, and playful side of BDSM. The dungeon is well equipped with 3 St Andrews Crosses, a seated cross, 2 benches, a kneeling spanking/flogging bench, a standing spanking/flogging bench, a suspension station, 2 padded saw horses, a standing/kneeling stock, an 8' chain spider web, and a petting cage. We offer several toys to come and experience and play with such as feathers, a variety of floggers, paddles, crops, pinwheels, fur gloves, and a violet wand. Our personnel are available to provide instruction and demonstration on the safe use of the equipment and will supervise all play. We also have a lounge area where you can relax and meet our campmates while checking out our camp. The lounge has a spanking bike, a corn hole bean bag game, lounge chairs, a mini bar serving our cherry bombs for those over 21 years old with id, as well as, a spinning wheel to facilitate participation.  There are also daily scheduled classes with demonstrations and audience participation. We'll have an Intro Into Dungeon Play and a Shibari Sexy Body Rope Tying classes. We also have gifting of collars, paddles and patches. Our hours accommodate those coming in an play both day and night, generally from noon to about 3 am.
title: Open Dungeon Play

description:
This workshop will explore how open relationships can be way to transform the opposition between Freedom and Love into the mutual support of Love and Truth. 

Many people in relationships struggle to reconcile their Love for each other and desire for deep partnership with their desire for the Freedom to connect intimately with others. The default model for relationship in our society, monogamy, makes explicit the underlying belief that Freedom and Love exist in opposition with each other.

But what if our desire for Freedom in relationship is covering a deeper desire, namely that we want to know, and be assured, that we can speak and honor our deepest Truths, and Desires, even, and especially, while in we are in Loving committed partnerships. So what if, instead of talking about Freedom, we talked how to create a relationship where it's safe to speak our Truths, including all of our desires (even for others), and know that we will still be Loved?

Join us for a conversation about how open relationships can be created from a place deep Love and commitment to Truth.
title: Open Relationships as a Path of Love and Truth
print_description: This workshop will explore how open relationships can transform the opposition between Freedom and Love into the mutual support of Love and Truth.

description: Party Naked Tiki Bar is a clothing optional bar returning to the Playa for our seventh year to provide “Tiki Punch” libations to thirsty Black Rock City citizens 21 and over. You must be 21 or over to Party here and we do ask for and check ID's (it's always good to carry your ID while at Burning Man). We start the mornings with Bloody Mary's at 9:00am until we run out. We then dispense our "Tiki Punch" (yes, it has a punch) well into the night. Nudity is never required but at Party Naked Tiki Bar it is rewarded. This year we have 1800+ hand painted commemorative leis to give to citizens that "do it" (get naked). Make sure to come by early and get lei'd. We promote a no pressure relaxed atmosphere where you can get naked or not. Nude is not lewd so uninvited touching is prohibited. Come by for a cool drink where you can sit and chat or meet new people. Enjoy our classic rock atmosphere music and a little shade in the heat of the day. Be LNT friendly and bring your own cup please.
title: Party Naked and Get Lei'd
print_description: Serving cold Tiki Punch to BRC citizens 21+ for 7 years. Have a seat, enjoy the rock, get naked here & you may get lei'd. Please bring own cup and ID.

description:
RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP Demolition Derby Races under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH! Or Neither. 

Several Riders PEDAL AND DRIVE head-to-head around a 60 x 90 foot track under the gorgeous CIRCUS TENT with LIGHTS, MUSIC and ANNOUNCERS! Our BUMPER CARTS are custom designed and one-of a kind! It's like driving your own personal pedal powered art car for 3 minutes or however long you last. The TENT is a SHADY OASIS in the DAY and a LIT-UP BEACON of fun at NIGHT!

 Winners of each race are determined by a mysterious mix of whatever the announcers at the time deem worthy. Is it the number of rear end or T-bone collisions you make happen? or maybe how many crashes you nimbly avoid with expert driving skills. Or maybe your winning attitude. Or your crazy costume. Maybe you cross the finish line first. Maybe you cross it last or not at all. You might still be a WINNER. We're betting on it! KIDS tall enough to pedal are welcome. Adults of ALL AGES brave or timid welcome. ALL Spectators welcome too! Come into the center ring and heckle your friends in the races!

PEDALING is FUN but BUMPING is EVEN BETTER! Seriously, the bumpers keep you safe and you will laugh your ass off with every bump, crash, skid or pass. 

We also welcome volunteers who want to help with PIT CREW duties! Wrangle the crowds, heckle the riders, keep the pedal carts repaired. Sign up for our newsletter on our FB page or just stop by anytime we are live on Playa!
title: PEDALBUMP Derby Races under the BIG TOP
print_description: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP demolition Derby "Races" under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH!

description: Don’t be a Boar all by yourself, come play with the Pigs! We’ve been hosting our famous daytime party on the Playa for well over a decade. Our fabulous bartenders hog-craft each and every Bloody Mary we make with over 10 different ingredients. Sizzling strips of pork are hoof-served to the squealing swine wallowing on our shaded sofas.  All vegetarians are welcomed (to be converted) at our event. Get your trotters tapping with DJ Julio playing some of the best (and obscure) disco you’ll ever hear. It kicks off around 11-ish in the morning. Just bring a cup and a smile.  It’ll be sooieet.

description:
Join us for the annual Preservation Society Pig Roast Party on Friday night -- slow-roasted 60 lbs hog, lamb grilled to savory perfection, and a cornucopia of succulent flora. Not to mention drink, DJs, dancing and excellent company into the night and beyond. This year's party is also a celebration of the wedding of two members of our amazing community. 

If you are lucky enough to have visited the Preservation Society as a young hooligan, then wherever you go it stays with you, for the Society is a movable feast.

description: New this year is Pimp 'n Wine. It’s safety first at ShangriLa. Drink wine and get lit. While sipping grog at our Weinkeller, we will pimp you out for the evening with LED lights. Our gang of revelers will fashion one of a kind works of night light-art to attach to your ensemble or eccentric hairstyle (also created by us) to ensure you are well-lit and bewitching for the evening. The batteries and LED lights will last the entire week creating safer Burners when the Playa turns dark. What better way to get noticed and these artfully crafted pieces make the best Playa keepsakes. We will ensure our new friends and neighbors are safe and smoking hot for the evening. So come and enjoy our new Weinkeller - and get perfectly playafied and ready for the night to party! Monday: Sangria - Wednesday: White Wine - Thursday: Red Wine - Friday: Bubblies (Champagne). You have be twenty-one (21) to drink @ ShangriLaLa. Love & Light!

description:
Come meet the artists AND create next year's Ploem. Ploetry is inspirational prose cut out from planks of wood, hung from a 5-sided city-shaped tower, with color-changing backlight and custom seating. This year there are two towers, "I Am But Wood", a poem written from the point of view of the Man, and "Voice of the Temple", written from the point of view of the Temple. Next year, we want to add more Ploems, scattered as Easter Eggs around the Playa. Forms available to write and submit your own ploem 24 hours a day, and we'll post it on the Ploetry website.
Write a ploem, build an installation, or both - we'll show you how. This is a workshop - all building is done off-season, off-playa. But take your inspiration to write your Ploem while in Black Rock City! *** Please note that this event takes place at the tower in the Cafe, not the tower on the open playa. *** MWF 11-noon, TT 5pm-6m, in the large Ploetry installation in Center Camp Cafe.
title: Ploetry I & II
print_description: Ploetry (Playa Poetry) is cut from planks of wood hung from a backlit tower. Meet the artists, join the team, write next year's "ploem". In the cafe.

description:
Two Globe traveling 5 Rhythms and Tantra teachers who are widely practiced in the poly lifestyle come together to share their highlights, low lights, what they have learned along the way and what they wish they had not!

Come learn some pro tips and bring your questions. This is about sharing and listening to each other. We are all figuring this out and doing the best we can. Eugene & Mackenzie are as eager to talk about the challenges as they are to share in the joys.

We will have a little movement exercise to ground into presence in our bodies, as that is the best way to open to the true questions which reflect our heart's yearning and fears.

This will be a thoughtful, provocative and fun gathering. Let us learn from each other and in the end open to the possibility of more love, however it looks for us individually.
title: Polyamory – Does this really work?
print_description: Let's talk about Polyamory - Come listen, learn some pro tips & have YOUR questions answered! Bring your curiosity and let us learn together!

description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.
title: Poly High Tea
print_description: All you Polyamorous-poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues.

description: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP Demolition Derby Races under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH! Or Neither. Several Riders PEDAL AND DRIVE head-to-head around a 60 x 90 foot track under the gorgeous CIRCUS TENT with LIGHTS, MUSIC and ANNOUNCERS! Our BUMPER CARTS are custom designed and one-of a kind! It's like driving your own personal pedal powered art car for 3 minutes or however long you last. The TENT is a SHADY OASIS in the DAY and a LIT-UP BEACON of fun at NIGHT! Winners of each race are determined by a mysterious mix of whatever the announcers at the time deem worthy. Is it the number of rear end or T-bone collisions you make happen? or maybe how many crashes you nimbly avoid with expert driving skills. Or maybe your winning attitude. Or your crazy costume. Maybe you cross the finish line first. Maybe you cross it last or not at all. You might still be a WINNER. We're betting on it! KIDS tall enough to pedal are welcome. Adults of ALL AGES brave or timid welcome. ALL Spectators welcome too! Come into the center ring and heckle your friends in the races! PEDALING is FUN but BUMPING is EVEN BETTER! Seriously, the bumpers keep you safe and you will laugh your ass off with every bump, crash, skid or pass. We also welcome volunteers who want to help with PIT CREW duties! Wrangle the crowds, heckle the riders, keep the pedal carts repaired. Sign up for our newsletter on our FB page or just stop by anytime we are live on Playa! GUEST HOST CREWS SCHEDULED: GATE  CREW is Representing on Tuesday night. MYSTIKAL MISFITS are representing on Wednesday night!
title: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP
print_description: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP Demolition Derby Races under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH!

description:
Relating from Our True Nature

This workshop is designed to be simultaneously deep and playful. We begin with a deep dive into our truth—our true nature—which is simply a letting go and a knowing of who we always already are, beyond our ideas about ourselves and others: a simple direct undeniable knowing of our clear deep heart-mind-being. 
We will ground ourselves in this present moment and connect with our higher self and cultivate our intentions, desires, and wishes for the night.
Using movement, stillness, and humor we bring awareness and acceptance to ourselves and our conditioning.
Through simple spontaneous body movements you embody and express your truth(s) and your true being. 
Finally we move into connecting and relating with each other while staying connected with our self. This process will be facilitated with some simple relating exercises and is a chance to see through our ego and conditioned habitual ways of relating and being. We invite a sense of humor to simply seeing ourselves and the conscious and unconscious games we play. 
Bringing awareness to our patterns opens the possibility of playing with them and responding from our clear deep heart mind space, rather than reacting. Respond from awareness rather than react from habits. We live from our true nature rather than our conditioning. We dance.
title: Relating from Our True Nature
print_description: Dive deep into your true Self beyond thoughts, words and emotions.Learn to live and relate from your truths and stop identifying with fear/lack.

description:
An innovative blend of Hathaway Yoga, Temple Fusion Belly Dance & Ritual through the art of women's vitality practices using yogic principles.

RITUAL MOVEMENT ARTS (R.M.A) With Aradia Sunseri
An innovative blend of Hatha Yoga, Temple Fusion Belly Dance & Ritual Theatre. 

We will explore the art of women’s vitality practices 
focused on:
~Creating, cultivating & nurturing your personal practice: 
~Inner yoga’s 
~ Temple Fusion Belly dance
~Breathe work
~Meditation
~Mudras
~Isolations, drills,Layering
~Theatrical presence, flourishes

Focusing on dancing from the core. Opening the body with yogic principles to deepen your connection to your dance. With presence fluidity and slinky theatrical moves. Exploring intricate mudras, and choreography while activating the creative soul seat of each individual’s personal transformative power. Tune in with your inner archetypal energy and the art of storytelling through the eyes, hips, & heart. These vitality practices offer connection to ones own essence and cultivate enjoyment of the body in motion while sharing in a community of sisterhood.
title: Ritual Movement Arts- Aradia Sunseri
print_description: An innovative blend of Hathaway Yoga, Temple Fusion Belly Dance & Ritual through the art of women's vitality practices using yogic principles.

description:
Roasted Breaux & Coffee Heaux Coffee Camp will be open on Monday, Wednesday & Friday from 2-4 PM for your afternoon pick-me-up.  Create your own unique blend of coffee from our selection of international Playa-roasted coffee, grind your beans, and enjoy it served pour-over style.  Sit, relax and chill with friends new and old in our Arabian-inspired coffee house lounge. 
We will be roasting coffee at various times during the week so you won't find a fresher cup of coffee in BRC, or anywhere!!!  
If you would like, please join in and help us roast our next batch of Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux Playa-blend.  Ask about coming by and roasting your own on-the-Playa beans to bring back to the default world (a little Playa dust is the secret ingredient!), or help us gift coffee to the burners who serve our community.  
In the LNT (Leave No Trace) spirit, please remember to bring your own cup.  Or you may have to play a special carnival game to "earn" one...
title: Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux
print_description: Roasted Breaux & Coffee Heaux-Monday, Wednesday & Friday 2-4 PM. Create your own blend of international, Playa-roasted coffee. Join in roasting too!!!

title: Roasted Breauxs & Coffee Heauxs  Coffee Camp

description:
"What is Rootism?" My response to this in short: Rootism is a belief that the truth of our learned existence lies in the Roots of all teachings/truths and beliefs. These truths are different for everyone based on how they we raised and what we resonate with at the time of our learning. As a Rootist, we take the roots of various truths and incorporate them into our own mantra, our own way of living, to become the well rounded person that we wish to be. When you resonate with more than one truth, you are a Rootist. There are many different types of Rootist's. You could be a Christian Rootist, a Buddhist Rootist, or any type of Rootist. The moment you resonate with more than one truth & take the roots of those teachings as your truths, you become a Rootist.

Rootism is a lesson that I have learned and come to resonate with over the last few years. I am grateful to share this information with each of you. Please feel free to share this with anyone with whom you feel might be interested.

As an offset of Rootism, we have The Rootist's Way. A style of yoga that is in-tentful in it's design and sequences to help to facilitate a certain type of energy clearing and calling in of new energies.

Thank you for reading this and for wanting to know more about Rootism.

The 8 Principles of Rootism:

∞Principles of Rootism™

1. Release what no longer serves - nurture yourself & ground yourself
2. Embrace a Creative Vision
3. Move forward on your journey -Take Steps Fearlessly
4. Empathize and Feel what is going on within you & others
5. Motivate yourself & others by Truth – Check the Ecology of the Whole
6. Bridge the Mind & the Heart
7. Evolve a Pro-Sociality Lifestyle & Manifest a Greater Humanity - help others and give back
8. Revolutionize - Reveal Yourself! Open UP! Inner Knowing is Outer Showing

The acronym is "Remember"
title: Rootist Yoga Practice
print_description: Rootism is a belief that the truth of our learned existence lies in the Roots of all teachings/truths and beliefs.

description: Gift yourself the opportunity to flow through Burning Man from a place of groundedness, liberation and power. By tapping into the vulnerabilities experienced within our bodies, we can discover where pain and triggers are stored by the ego, allowing for us the ability to see them for what they are, liberate ourselves from them, and fully fill them with the light and power already existing within us. Release your greatest self out onto the playa through guided touch, divine creation and ecstatic movement.

print_description: Ground your body and liberate what separates you from its light and power through connection to touch, divine creation and ecstatic movement.

description:
A practical guide to the shortest path to your higher self through the loving (and sometimes critical) eyes of your beloved.

Learn how to use romantic love to unwind and heal your historical pain (and your partners) to reveal your true self - more magnificent than you currently have the capacity to imagine - and dissolve the boundaries between purpose and money, sex and creativity, partnership and self, and unleash the power of dyadic leadership (using duality the way it was designed to be used!)

Taught by Jennifer Russell and Bryan Franklin, teachers and leaders-by-example of radical evolutionary love, as depicted by Android Jones in their now world-famous portrait and upcoming documentary by the same name, "Union."
title: Rule-Breaking Evolutionary Love Relationships

description: Join us inside Zooplankton for SCIENCE!! We'll have specimens of Calocyclas monumentum, a microscopic species of protozoa which our macroscopic art is based off of for you to look at through a microscope. Inside Zooplankton we'll host science lectures throughout the week at 11am. Topics to include biology, climate change, archaeology, and the process of combining art and science to build Zooplankton. Other workshops and class schedules will be posted daily outside of Zooplankton and on a board at Zooplankton Art Support camp.
title: Science in the Shade
print_description: View microscopic plankton in a microscope and hear science lectures inside our macroscopic model of the same plankton. SCIENCE! Subjects posted daily.

description: View Saturn’s rings and up to 6 of it’s moons through our giant hand-made telescope at Black Rock Observatory! You’ll see a billion miles into the outer Solar System with our precision parabolic mirror that brings Saturn’s beautiful ring system and moons to deep playa. Stargazing till dawn. Saturn is visible to the naked eye after Sunset in the SW until about 10:30pm PST.
title: See Saturn!
print_description: Peer across a billion miles to see the majestic rings of Saturn. Glimpse it's distant moons and  transport from deep playa to the outer solar system.

description: The Butterfly is a high-vibrant, spiritual creation. It is sensitive to its surrounding and is vibrating in the same wavelength as the particles of niverse, as well as the life on earth. It lives in symbiosis with nature, mostly in flowers, becoming one with the Beauty All Around. The Butterfly symbolizes the Universal Spiritual knowledge and deep Wisdom, and creates its life in the perfect alignment of non-attachment, in a dance of flow and Ease. It has a life filled of transformation, from the day of birth until re-birth, between stages, outer and inner form, with ease and grace moving further, without attaching to its old shape, heart wide open for the life in front of Her. This Yogic Journey is dedicated for you to connect with YOUR inner Butterfly, through a travel of transformation, through your body and senses. Bring a Mat (if you have), soft clothing, yourself, as the beautiful and whole being you are.

Venture back in time to the early 1900’s and get a peak into how prostitutes lived in the red light district of New Orleans. We’ll showcase real “ladies of the night” by having framed pictures of women hung throughout the bar. We’ll ask insightful questions of our guests in hopes to get them thinking about the lives and personalities that inspired our beloved camp theme. Also, we value Radical Inclusion and it is our hope to build a cohesive and connected neighborhood. In an attempt to establish community, we’ll promote our first happy hour as a “get to know your neighbors” event. description:
Quit thinking that talk will improve your relationship.  We are way more advanced and ready to understand each other without so many words. Words are dangerous, but assumptions... WAY MORE DANGEROUS! and, MORE FUN!! So we will be exploring where assumptions come from and creating different pathways that have a much better chance for accuracy, and.... wait for it.... INITMACY! (yes that pot of gold we are looking for at the end of those playa rainbows!) In this space of curiosity, experimentation and practice, YOU WILL LEARN the emerging art of SUBTLE COMMUNICATION. You will be able to describe your month in Bali in seven (7) words or less in a way that creates more understanding, more curiosity and, yes, more intimate connection (every time) than your 90 minute slide show and endless stories. Really... 
Answer the tiresome question "How are you?" in three (3) words that will say more, build immediate trust and help you to purge more friends on facebook than ever before! We all have the ability to 'know' more without using the left side of our brain. We just aren't so practiced. So, with a bit of science, a measure of technique, the willingness to try a 'different way' and a whole workshop of practice! we will be ready to immediately upgrade any relationship, including the one with the hottie you will meet tonight outside the Pleasure Dome! Ready!?
title: Shut Up and have a better Relationship!
print_description: Talk is cheap, but silence is golden. OK, not complete silence, but we WILL SEE how LESS (talk) CAN BE MORE (meaning)!

description: Step right up, ladies and gents, children of all ages, for the best refreshment you’ll find in this entire Carnival!  Look out for the palm trees and pink flamingoes which tell you that you’ve discovered none other than the infamous Paradise Motel, where weary carnival goers are invited to stop by for the best snow cones in the world while lounging in the shade in our chill lounge enjoying the melodic beats of our world class digital music purveyors.   This year, you’ll find as our roadside attraction none other than a purveyor of prognostications as a teller of fortunes has set up a tent where you can find out what your future has in store!  Our opulent Motel will also include a concierge desk where you can discover all the goings on in this most flamboyant section of the carnival.  Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice are always appreciated.  And as always, if you show your junk, you get to cut to the front (of the snow cone queue).
title: Snow Cones @ Paradise Motel
print_description: Enjoy a snow cone and music while lounging in our shade. Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice welcomed. Remember, if you show your junk, cut to the front!

description: Snowshoe Race & Ramble meet at noon at the Black Rock City Snowshoe Team's camp located at Alternative Energy Zone for a short Ramble. We loan you the snowshoes (limited to 10 ramblers daily) and ramblers are gifted our team t-shirt. Experience the Playa on 4 foot shoes. Ramblers and Spectators try our pure maple syrup shooters over crushed ice! The ramble will be postponed in the event of rain / mud.
title: Snowshoe Race & Ramble, Noon
print_description: Snowshoe Race & Ramble meet at noon at the Black Rock City Snowshoe Team's camp located at Alternative Energy Zone for a short Ramble on 4 foot shoes

description: Come party with the brightest and the tightest as Mystopia brings back its annual masquerade. Polish off those reflective boots and come get down in a night filled with booze & beats. Glam’s glittery stomp reigns supreme as our Mystopia DJs and friends turn it out with an eclectic mix of danceable tracks.

print_description: The annual Friday night masquerade returns. Put on your most reflective gear and come shine with us for a night of booze and beats.

description: As artists, we remake the world in our image - our imaginings. Given that we have this gift, how do we receive it in a way that allows us to create a more connected, open-hearted, and spiritually authentic world? A full-body/heart/soul experiential workshop through the four realms of human consciousness, where we will unlock our imaginal bodies, meet some of our "inner crew," become our own superheroes, and experience the oneness of our good ol' friend, the Universe.
title: Social Artists: How Our Creations Impact The World
print_description: A full-body/heart/soul experiential workshop through the four realms of human consciousness, where we will unlock our imaginal bodies...

description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not for her or him. Today it's okay to have just woken up in the morning, okay to be stimulated by your own silky boxers, and okay to be TURNED ON, because you have a right to your feelings and you get to do whatever you want with your body.
title: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
print_description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on!

description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Just for today, let all burping be considered socially appropriate. Buuuuuuuurp!!!
title: Socially Appropriate Burp Day
print_description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Buuuuuuuurp!!!

description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!
title: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
print_description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!

description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—you don't have to be embarrassed just because you have a naturally occurring blood flow. Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!
title: Socially Appropriate Menstruation Day
print_description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—skip the pad and tampon for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Let the blood make its artistic mark!

description: Who wants to suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in their nose? Get those dried up playa boogers out of there already! Don't worry if anyone's watching you go deep with that index finger! Why not give that thumb a try! It's time for each of us to get the relief we deserve and to breathe just a little freer. And go ahead, flick it on the ground because that's where that stuff came from.
title: Socially Appropriate Nose Picking Day
print_description: Don't suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in your nose. Go ahead and have the relief you deserve and breathe just a little freer.

description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today. That's right—celebrate one of the great mammalian mysteries and let out a big old yawn even when someone is talking right at you. No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!
title: Socially Appropriate Yawn Day
print_description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today.

description:
Throughout the week, Heroes & Super Villains operates our bar, Skullicious, a piece of artwork for the Burning Man community to enjoy, during afternoon and evening hours. We are a slow bar, designed to help the weary Burner take a load off, tell us some stories and make some new friends while we diligently craft signature cocktails. 

Concurrently, our resident sound curators spin smooth vibes that start off soothing our community from the daytime heat before energizing the revelers for the bacchanal of the Playa at night. 
Music & Cocktail Theme:
-Tuesday: Midsummer Night’s Playa Dream
-Wednesday: Space Dust - Outpost HSV
-Thursday: Mad Hatter’s Sunset Cocktail Party
title: Soul Garden - Music and Cocktail Lounge
print_description: Relax from the heat before recharging for the nighttime revelry with sounds from internationally renowned DJs. A new musical and drink theme each day.

description:
ENHIGHTENED BEINGS OF LEISURE Infamous Costume cocktail party @ sunset daily @ Red Nose District! Come by on stilts (or off) to revel in the beauty of ENHIGHTENED BEINGS on the Esplanade. This year, our Stilt Bar crew celebrates with a variety of circus/carnival themes from around the world and throughout time! Bring your Playa Cocktail cup (and your ID) and stilt up  to our tall bar for a refreshing cocktail. Gaze upon the beauty of stilters in costume against the backdrop of the beautiful sunset. All non-stilters welcome too. Come in costume. Those stilters need some short people to gaze up at them in wonder and their bravery and dexterity!

MONDAY- Our traditional formal night we celebrate the origins of the circus with a Commedia Del Arte party! Think Masks, gowns, pantaloons, jessters and harlequin!

TUESDAY- Menagerie-Circus Animals and their Trainers-We realize animal circuses aren't PC but they are historical and the trainer costumes..well hilarious!

WEDNESDAY- Freaks, FUN HOUSE and Side Show Carnies. We KNOW you have a FREAK in there somewhere!

THURSDAY- Classic Clown Brigade! Be Whatever style clown you like. Happy, sad, joyous, mad, funny, magical, slutty, evil....All Clowns and Klowns welcome! SPECIAL GUESTS our own Professional Clown Brigade! 

FRIDAY- The Devil’s Carnival- remember this creepy 2012 Movie? (yeah we don't either) but it combines circus and the & 7 DEADLY SINS!...what could be better?? Lost souls enter The Devil's Carnival where they are each faced with the sins they committed in life.
title: STILT BAR COSTUMED COCKTAIL SUNSET PARTY
print_description: ENHIGHTENED BEINGS OF LEISURE Infamous Costume Cocktail Party @ sunset daily! CALLING all STILTERS to revel with other tall ilk of your kind!

description:
Welcome to Swap Meat!

This event is organized by The Trustable Sluts: a community of sexually liberated socially responsible women.

This is a mixer for sexually liberated, socially responsible women* and the men and women (and everyone in between) who love them.

With Swap Meat, we turn traditional gender dynamics on their head and invite both men and women who want to date, relate and have sexual connections with women who identify as women* who are self-aware, sex-positive, love warriors.

WHO ARE WE: trustablesluts.com

There will be little structure and much fun. We will bring something to identify the "meat" and identify Trustable Slut Members.

# 1 rule of SWAP Meat is
you bring someone AWESOME
to SWAP Meat.

We want to be introduced to more amazing people who want to meet fun, playful, and open women, who are in alignment with our values.

Bring someone who you would recommend to date your best friend. Bring someone who is "available" to date. Bring someone who has good boundaries and knows how to communicate. Bring someone who YOU are 100% okay with sharing.

Who NOT to bring:
-Some random person off the playa
-Someone who is overly eager to hook-up (aka desperate).
-Someone who isn't emotionally available or at least self-aware.

Official Meat Policy:

1) Meat can be of any gender.
2) We encourage "available" meat. That word has many interpretations...it is whatever it means to you. However, here are some ways it means to us:
+ is single or in an open relationship.
+ their relationship agreements allow for dating.
+ has time to date, meaning not just interested in hooking-up.
+ has experience in our or some other community of sexy tribe.
+ has emotional intelligence and communication skills.

*NOTE: We are open to all gender orientations and sexual orientations. We are LGBTQ friendly.
title: Swap Meat! with the Trustable Sluts
print_description: The Trustable Sluts host a sex positive dating meet-up. Come have a drink and meet some lovely people. Maybe you'll get your meat swapped.

description: The AUM (Awareness Understanding Meditation) Workshop is based on the understanding that in order to find its silence, the western mind first needs to express its tension and stress.The aim of the AUM Meditation is to consciously transform stress and negative emotions into positive creative energy, and to create personal well being and peace through a social process of Awareness, Understanding and Meditation.It is divided in twelve stages that allows you to experience all shades of your emotional life ‚Äì anger, love, sadness, laughter ‚Äì and to express these emotions in a protected and safe environment.Once emotional awareness and intelligence are mastered, it becomes easier to express emotions in a healthy way, resulting in more effective communication skills and a greater sense of personal empowerment. The fear of expressing all our feelings diminishes, freeing us to make a genuine choices about how we act. Unspoken positive and negative feelings can create blocks in our relationships with friends, colleagues and loved ones.Through experiencing the AUM, relating becomes clearer, more honest and more fun. the AUM also allows you to reclaim to joy of simply being alive.Bring a pillow or cushion
title: Tantric AUM
print_description: A high energy social meditation that allows you to express the full rainbow of emotions AND taste the deep awareness that holds it all of it
