description:
“Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality.” ~ Lewis Carroll (1871)  “Through the Looking Glass, and What Alice Found There” 

To peer “Through the Looking Glass” is to seek alternative perspectives, to imaginatively approach a traditional problem or line of reasoning in order to illuminate impossible solutions. This often requires a willful transformation of ourselves — a creative shape-shifting — so that we see the world with new eyes, new senses, a new consciousness. It is only in this way that a new world reveals itself — as strange, yes, but perhaps also closer to world in which we dream.

In 2015, TEDx BlackRockCity will be an opportunity to open and reflect ourselves in new ways, to a new world, in which we are all transformed by ideas that matter.
title: TEDxBlackRockCity
print_description: "Through the Looking Glass" - Lewis Carroll (1871) - TEDxBRC features Ideas Worth Spreading while celebrating our 5th year of this important program.

description: Come to Black Rock Observatory to view the universe through our giant hand-made telescope or get your hands on a real meteorite. Using a precision parabolic mirror, we’ll show you space and time. Photons are travelling billions of miles at light speed through space just to meet you at the Observatory, will you be there to meet them? Get the big picture in the Macro Dome or see inner space in the Micro Dome. See Saturn’s rings, craters on the Moon and deep-sky wonders live with your own eyes after Sunset every night. Science talks, exhibits and special events happening all week.
title: Telescope Viewing
print_description: View the universe through a giant hand-made telescope or get your hands on a real meteorite.  See Saturn’s rings or craters on the Moon live!

description:
Explore the laws of Detachment, Polarity, Pure Potentiality, Sufficiency & Abundance. Put these laws into use to manifest what you desire.
Glimmer began her coaching experience as a HR Rep at Cisco Systems, Inc. She has now found a natural extension of her passion in supporting individuals with articulating their ideal life and creating a plan to achieve it. Through this work, Glimmer assists people in bridging the gap between their current existence and their dream life.

In addition to holding a BS in Psychology, Glimmer is earning her coaching certification through the QSCA. Through this year long program, her focus has been Law of Attraction and Light Body work.

Glimer sees her special talents as the ability to extract visions out of her clients and get them on paper where they can be evaluated and converted into working life plans and guides for daily decision-making.
title: The 4 'Missing' Laws of Attraction- Glimmer
print_description: Explore the laws of Detachment, Polarity, Pure Potentiality, Sufficiency & Abundance. Put these laws into use to manifest what you desire.

description:
All couples are invited to this playful exploration of intimate partnership and love as a spiritual practice and path to realization.   Harness the wisdom of the body and the physical sensations of love to deepen trust, strengthen communications, and create a powerful shared vision for your love relationship.   Discover ancient Yogic, Tantric, and Taoist exercises that will allow you to gain deep insight into your relationship and see your partner in a whole new light, whether you just met on the playa or renewing your vows on your 40th anniversary. You will experience your partner’s love and trust in a new and profound way. Learn how to use these powerful skills and movements to create a new and exciting level of intimacy that deepens the physical, spiritual, and emotional aspects of your sacred connection.  We will explore couple-hood as a yogic path to realization, letting go of the mind and surrendering to the heart through your lover. It is a practice of using your two-ness to realize oneness.  Yoga and Qigong are like brother and sister. 

Both are esoteric, alchemical practices that were created for self-realization, with exercise being a secondary benefit. Qigong is much gentler than most forms of yoga, and a wonderful compliment to a vigorous yoga practice. Both practices have a common source, Neolithic shamanic practices, and both are ancient books of wisdom written in the language of the body. We'll physically explore the connection between these 2 books of wisdom within the context of your love relationship. We are channeling the sexual and creative energies of the body through visualization, movement, ritual, and breath, not sexual activity. Tantric Qigong is an intimate practice of being gentle with oneself and weaving one's own sexual energy, becoming truly receptive to one's own body dialogue.
title: The Alchemy of Love: Neolithic Tantric Qigong
print_description: A playful exploration of love as a spiritual path.  Deepen trust through non-verbal communication & energy exercises.  All couples welcome.

description:
Get your golden outfit ready and dust off that rope chain as we take ALL GOLD EVERYTHING back in time with some of our favorite NYC Old School Hip-hop classics!

Let there be many gold sneakers, many gold thongs, but no golden showers!

Whatever you please!!! 

LL Cool J, said it best….. 

“I want a girl with extensions in her hair, Bamboo earrings, at least two pair.
A Fendi bag and a bad attitude, that's all I need to get me in a good mood
She can walk with a switch and talk with street slang
I love it when a woman ain't scared to do her thang
Standing at the bus stop sucking on a lollipop
Once she gets pumping its hard to make the hottie stop.”

And to that Salt and Pepa would say..… 

“If looks could kill you would be an uzi
You're a shotgun - bang! What's up with that thang?
I wanna know how does it hang?
Straight up, wait up, hold up, Mr. Lover
Like Prince said you're a sexy mutha-…

….I love you in your big jeans, you give me nice dreams
You make me wanna scream, "Oooo, oooo, oooo!"
I like what ya do when you do what ya do…You make me wanna shoop”

Drops the mic….

Thursday, September 3rd 2:00-5:00pm
Serving up Jungle Juice, Purple Drank and Old E
PLUS your favorite 80s snacks: 
Doritos 
Fruit Roll-Ups
Twinkies 
Frozen popsicles
Beef Jerky
POSTS
title: The Cabana Club Presents: The Golden Era of Hip Ho
print_description: Get your golden outfit ready as we take ALL GOLD EVERYTHING trip back in time with some of our favorite NYC Old School Hip-hop!

description:
Remember the most majestic tree you have ever experienced?

Did you have enough time to celebrate it? To dream with it?

Majestic trees give living form to the most diverse places on Earth. When they disappear, unseen, the world flattens. These trees are becoming rare. And valuable.

The Canopy Tribe helps others to sleep in majestic trees. To have time to dream – and radically self express.

Three-minute crash courses in tree hunting, tree climbing, tree campouts, tree house building and tree circus.

Acrobats, architects, artists, arborists, tree huggers welcome.
title: The Canopy Tribe: Sleep in Temple Trees
print_description: Majestic trees are living mansions of the forest, pillars of evolution. Learn how to climb, sleep, build, dream, and radically self-express in them.

description: Think you know your campmates or that new playa partner well? Can you recognize them like a hamster does-by smell? Try recognizing them with their face covered up in a frolicking hamster free-for-all, where boys could be girls, and girls might be kissing squirrels! Bring your creepiest mask, you creative DIY Burner, you. But if you don't, make one for the occasion in our mask booth. If costumed trickery is what you crave, come on down for our rodent masquerade!
title: The Creepy Hamster Masquerade
print_description: If costumed trickery is what you crave, come on down for our rodent masquerade!

description: Come all ye playa dappers, dames and ragamuffins and indulge in our beloved Quebecois spring ritual: the sugaring-off party. The Dusty Beavers will recreate the jovial, old-time Cabane à Sucre (Sugar Shack) tradition on the Playa. Maple syrup will be boiled to amber-hued perfection, drizzled on snow (crafted in secrecy, but with love), then artistically twirled into a sticky sweet gem-like glob. Don your dustiest glad rags to chill out in our maple-icious speakeasy and indulge your sweet tooth with nature’s sweetest sap. No beaver pelt trade expected or required in return. Come and experience this unique, sugar fueled ‘joie de vivre’.
title: The Dusty Beavers’ Maple Taffy Stickeasy
print_description: For you, The Dusty Beavers will recreate the Quebec Sugar Shack tradition. Come and experience the unique taste of Maple Toffee on Snow!

description: Trade your dusty tookus for a warm drink and cold slap, plow it with a snowboardski or three, try your hand at Giant Beer Pong or Jenga, chill under hundreds of G-Strings!  Face it, out here, there's no escaping a Dusty Bumm! Specials daily 3-6. Bill Murray happy hour daily.
title: The Dusty Bumm
print_description: Warm drinks, cold slaps, snowboardski, Giant Beer Pong, Jenga, hundreds of g-strings. Specials daily 3-6. Bill Murray happy hour daily.

Honoring the Catty Goddesses of the playa... this is the SWB celebration of the week!  The finest wines, elegant food, bdsm equipment, and music from the altars of heaven (DJ Goth Thug & DJ PJ). 
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bubastis
This is a Festival of the Feminine... the Sacred Feminine... the Dominant Feminine.  The rules are simple:  Got a dick?  You're there to serve, worship, obey, pamper, and amuse the women.  Women should dress their sexiest.  Men shall dress for and be subservient, or be ejected and fed to feral cats!  Eunuchs will be on guard to ensure the rules are followed.  (and yes... women can worship women too)

description: This is it!  Simply the fanciest party on the Playa.  We'll be dressing to the 11's and pouring our most topest-shelf alchemies. Come connect with old friends and new as we dance out tails off the back end of the Pyrobar, docked at it's home The Enclave. It shall all happen as it typically does on Tuesday night in Black Rock City, NV, somewhere up the 9:00 Avenue. Bar opens at 8PM, impromptu ad hoc performances to be announced, perhaps, most likely not. So dust on your finest threads and bring your best expression fancy selves to revel in our shared absurdity.
title: The Fifth Grande Playastani Ball
print_description: We'll be pouring our fanciest special alchemies as we dance, perform, and revel off the back of our dear Pyrobar, docked at Home, the Enclave up 9:00.

description:
"Where are the positive archetypes of feminine power? Kali, who cuts off your head? Hera, who is the god form of holly homemaker: basically “Zeus’ wife” with a goddess-sized jealous streak? Wonder Woman, who battles evil but has no family and no love in her life? It’s time for us to tell a new story of femininity, with our choices, with our self-expression, and with our lives. There are too few positive examples of women who are in full command of their sexuality and its attractive powers. There are too few healthy stories of women who’s full creative expression is unbridled and uncontrolled.

Learn how to harness the dual feminine forms and dual masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true manifestor - brining your highest vision into reality through your being, your words, and your actions.You will learn an unforgettable map of your own sources of power, some of which have been lying dormant for your entire life. Once you can locate and allow all four faces of incorruptible power to move through you, you can lead, inspire, and serve almost anyone.  For Men and Women who want to bring their full spiritual presence into the material world and be the bridge between our present reality and the future vision only you can see."
title: The Four Faces Of Incorruptible Personal Power
print_description: Learn how to harness the dual feminine forms and dual masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true manifestor - brining you

description:
LIke most carnival games, the risk is part of the fun.. This is a game with a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written.  Is it ever really simple?  “The Game” requires a high degree of interactivity among all those involved, even those walking by may become drawn into the action and be participants. “The Game” has a tendency to create possibilities where there were once boundaries.  Choices where there were once obstacles.  “The Game”: the love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and American's Got talent.. 
“The Game” is perfect for letting that INNER freak come out. Watch what happens when permission is given to the darker, more playful side of one's self. That part that stays just out of sight, watching from the sideline, wanting to take part, but doesn't due to social constraint or peer reprisal.
“The Game” is both a game of chance and boundaries.  Winning is all a matter of perspective. Everyone wins with the upside of personal insight, everyone loses what may have been a self-limiting perspective.  A new episode with each draw is guaranteed to amaze and astound!
title: The Game!
print_description: Created for the 2013 burn, this is a game, played at the bar, has a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written.

Find the Jankytown Orchestra aboard the JankaSaurus! - our brand new mobile stage, roving the playa.  Live music and performance art.

Jankytown is an artist's collective featuring Cirque du Cliché, Samba Stilt Circus, Fou Fou Ha Clowns, and Ministry of Flow Fire Arts.

The Jankytown Orchestra features live music from members of Albino! Tracorum, the Nibblers, Samba Stilt Circus, Samba Da, Snail Trail, Danger Mon, Kill the Specialness, and Ms. Pussycat and Señor Puppydog...

Look for us near the Esplanade each day for Sunset Jams

description: Having been both a blissed out artist and yoga teacher and a stressed-out tech executive, Michel Bayan has seen both sides of the "spiritual spectrum."  He'll share a bit about his journey then we'll open up for a group chat about how we all seek to find balance between going after what we want, without letting it overtake you, and seeking peace without mental apathy.   Come share, ask, or just listen.
title: The Journey of a Conscious Entrepreneur
print_description: There are two sides of the "spiritual" spectrum. The true challenge of our time is to find your own journey of balance between the two.

description: In the story of Hanuman (the mighty monkey deity of Hinduism) is a being with numerous gifts, and a faulty memory. On his path, he connects with others who remind him of his magical abilities. We are indeed mirrors for each other, with opportunity to reflect as the embodied unique contribution and how to bring more love and gratitude in the world. The Monkey Tantra is an experimental application of this idea, connecting together via loving human contact, vocalizing, visualizing, and inhabiting fearless graces through movement play and voice. Elements of dance, yoga, breath, chanting, and more combing to engage the body as a complete sensory organism. A sensory body is alert, animated, and alive. It resonated safety, security, and competence. It is ready for anything! This is an investigation, an exploration, a collaboration, a seriously FUN limitation-busting experiential living as we are - as ONE.
title: The Monkey Tantra - an interactive fun mix of voic

description: Burdened with useless swag?  How about something useful?  Stop by the Olfactorium and have a custom perfume created just for you by professional perfumer, Agent 11.  Scent evokes memories directly through the limbic system in a way no mere memento ever could.  You will leave with a mini perfume that is tailored to your tastes—something you can take back to the default world as an everyday reminder of your experiences at Burning Man.
title: The Olfactorium
print_description: Come to the Olfactorium for a custom perfume created just for you by our Mistress of Scent, Agent 11 so your beautiful burner-self will smell great!

description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private.  Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator.  When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience.  Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want.  No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options.  We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave.  We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun.  Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience.  Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense.  If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.
title: The Orgasamator Experience
print_description: The Orgasamator gives intense physical pleasure in a setting that's safe, comfortable, sensual & private. Exit refreshed & smiling. Female18+ only.
other_location: Located in Spanky's Village and Wine Bar

No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options.  We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave.  We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun.  Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience.  Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense.  If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.

description: The United Nations, for all its good, it not enough. description:
There are many things you 'could' do, but there's nothing you 'should' do. I suspect there's no such thing as a 'should'. A should is a 'could' with shame smuggled on top of it. Come explore shame and its cousins: guilt, envy, anger and jealousy. All these emotions have one thing in common, they usually hide their tracks and are hard to admit. Learn to transcend your shame with cutting edge subjective tools. We'll investigate the nature of shame & shaming, look at the adaptive advantages of them and how they serve & do not serve our development.

Join love coach Annie Lalla for some powerful exercises that will help you move beyond past shames and show you how desist from laying down new ones. This is a forum to discuss how to experience our emotions, especially the difficult ones, so they stop haunting your psyche.  You will leave shameless or at least shamelessly.
title: Transcending Shame, Guilt & Envy
print_description: Learn to transcend these often hidden emotions using cutting edge tools from Annie Lalla. You will leave shameless or at least shamelessly.

description: This is a classic Gender Blender event. Join us for a cup of tea and meet other trans, genderqueer, agender, gender nonconforming, and gender variant folks. Let's talk about our trans experiences on and off the playa. Let’s share our stories and support each other. Our goal is to create a space to feel comfortable being our true selves; we will listen, share, hold heart space, and bring our fullest selves.

description: San Francisco’s infamous electroswing/burlesque party returns to the playa for a feverish full-throttle freakeasy of highfalutin fulsomeness and low-down dirty deco bass. Doll up and dance to the haunting hoopla of the West Coast’s premier electroswing pioneers: DELACHAUX, THE KLOWN and The GENTLEMEN CALLERS of LOS ANGELES. And indulge in hypnotic undulations with international burlesque sensations TOSCA RIVOLA, IDA FOCHT, KITTY OAKS, VIOLET D’VINE, IVIZIA DAKINI, TANA THE TATTOOED LADY, BRITTANY WALSH, and those fabled fiends and floozies FOU FOU HA! Plus ferocious Femcee MISS EMMMA! This joint WILL jump. Equal parts Weimar cabaret and wild speakeasy rave, Trapeze lures a bevy of underworld flappers, vipers, vamps and villains to a bass-fueled night of jazz age abandon. The jungle drums are getting louder…

description:
There is power in making a choice to be present. To witness. To be witnessed. A choice to see and be seen as we are and in our highest self

When we gather with intention, we gather and increase in said powers. This will be such a gathering...

...and in such times and at such gatherings true magic, transformation, renewal and clarity through spaciousness are even more possible, even more accessible, for that tribal heart intention is an almost irresistible force for ourselves individually and collectively. 

This heart centered gathering is a simple but profound Puja (Devotional) ceremony of seeing and being seen first in silence, then with witnessing, listening and sharing, so that we may open to the possibility of falling in love with ourselves either directly or through the eyes of another. 

I invite you to be vulnerable. To see and be seen in this moment. To open to the beautiful reflections in each other. 

Come to this gathering because you are READY to step up into your full expression. Ready to be the Strong Man and a Powerful Woman who has the right to be met, and the right to love and be loved.
title: Tribal Tantra Heart Opening & Devotional Puja
print_description: Tantra Heart Puja (Devotional) ceremony of seeing & being seen. Open to the possibility of falling in love with yourself through the eyes of another.

description: Intuitive Movement Practice which invites us to tap into our innate magic & embody our capacity to heal & be healed. Come dance your divine!
title: Tribal Tantra Medicine Dance
print_description: Intuitive Movement Practice which invites us to tap into our innate magic & embody our capacity to heal & be healed. Come dance your divine!

description:
We will warm up with Movement Meditation to arrive in our bodies and listen to the wisdom within. As we dance, we will awaken the elemental spirits within our physical bodies as we invite that sacred tremor which frees our hearts to love to move us so that we may release that which has held us back and shed any limiting beliefs so that we may invite new gifts and possibilities into the empty space within. 

By embodying this ritual, we attune our body to tend toward our highest good while making space to step with clarity into what is next. 

Then we will offer the healing practice of Medicine Dance to melt some of the walls to giving and receiving that love within.

From that place, we will dance in the cultivated energy of the tribe - a full wave to ground all the gifts, shake loose any layers ready to release and make even more space to be empowered to our birth right to love and be loved, starting with the Self.
title: Tribal Tantra w/Eugene Hedlund @ RhythmWave
print_description: Ground your gifts, shake loose the layers ready to release, and make space to love and be loved, starting with the Self.

description: The art piece of the band U2 will be moved to the burn foot print of the man for a memorial burning on Sunday September 6th at 12 noon.  Our team will have food and beverages for all,  please come and bring a friend to honor the loss of the bands tour manager Dennis Sheehan.  Drummer Larry Mullin JRs father passed away this year also.  Last year Bono had a bike wreck in NYC and sufferd many injurys and is unable to play the guitar on this years tour,  lead guitarist "The Edge" fell off the stage in Canada this year and was hurt also.  The burning of the art piece will lift the bad luck the band has had to endure and also honor the memories of those who have pass away.   We are going to produce a video of the event for the U2 nation to share in the event on youtube.  Thank you,  Viper.
title: U2 Batterd And Brused Tour Of Sadness MemorialBurn

description:
Imagine, you’ve just met someone you’re highly attracted to. You’re having a wonderful conversation and you feel the excitement building in your chest.  You’re at the point where you know you want to take it to the next level. It’s the moment of no return. This moment of tension is both one of the hottest moments of attraction and potentially one of the most awkward.  

How do you know if the other person is at the same desire level? How do you assess their openness to touch, to a kiss, or more? A kiss or initial touch is relatively low stakes, but what happens when things heat up? What happens when you’ve just overstepped a line and can feel their withdrawal?  

These nuanced moments of initial sexual attraction can be the hottest of our lives. But we’re never really taught how to navigate highly sexually charged moments with someone completely new.  What does it mean to fully take responsibility for these moments so that when we’re done everyone involved feels totally awesome?   

In this workshop you will get a much deeper understanding of the nuances of initiating and negotiating hot and sexy connections. 

-Boost your sexual self-confidence
-Know how to feel your “fuck yes!” and your “Oh no!” and everything in between.
-Understand when and how to bring up "the conversation" so you don’t deflate all the sexual turn-on!
-Gain clear sexy communication skills to keep it hot while still conveying important information.
-And learn the number 1 reason why these skills will make you the sexiest person on earth!
title: Up Your Game with Sexy Skills!
print_description: Navigating New Sexy Connections: From “Fuck Yes!” To “Oh No!” and all those "Maybes" In Between! Held in the Chakralicious Camp Temple Dome.

description: Take a deep breath in. Fill the space between the earth and the sky with the light of your energy. Let the rising and falling of the breath move you in and out of postures both high and low, fast and slow, light and dark. Come find your voice, your rhythm and your dance through vigorous movements, grounding stillness and heart opening chanting. Guided meditation and breath work weaved in and out of this movement we call vinyasa yoga will open doors to parts of your body and mind unknown and will create a little more space both physically and subtly. Come take the leap, the ever graceful rise and fall and ascension into the sky. Come sweat it out and get ready for all the night has to offer.
title: Vinyasa Flow

description: We Are Evolution:  How does evolution function as the sure intelligence of life?  How are you, as a human being, a key part of shaping the future?  Why are people (and our unique, yet not special, souls) particularly important to the patterns of biological and consciousness evolution in our Galaxy at this time?  Join High Priestess and Regenerative Design Expert, Samantha Sweetwater for this interactive playshop where you will learn how to surf the integral & biological mechanisms of evolution.  Find and amplify your unique place and point of leverage in the soul ecology of Life.  Uplevel your present sense of purpose.  And, together with all others present, discover how to co-cause the future we want.
title: We Are Evolution with Samantha Beers
print_description: We Are Evolution:  Surf the integral & biological mechanisms of evolution. Uplevel your present life.  Discover how to co-cause the future we WANT.

description: Have you ever noticed that BM is not really a safe space for everyone? Have you ever felt like you are being treated like a freak because of your gender identity? Are you over people asking why your body looks the way it does? Are you interested in creating real safe spaces for people whether they fit in the binary or not? Are you troubled by cultural appropriation on playa and the way some folks are treated as other or freaks in a way that doesn't feel good? Then this workshop is for you. This workshop is also for you if you want to delve into the intersections of race, gender, class and how these identities affect our experience at BM and beyond. Many of us come to playa to be free and our full liberated selves yet when we pass through the gate we have not dropped our baggage of racism, transphobia, sexism, abelism, and classism at the gate.  So let's be real and talk about how these isms affect our time on playa and off and what we want to do to create the world we want to live in. This workshop will be interactive, engaging, fun, and educational. Let's define what we want the word freakshow to me and let's reclaim ourselves and whole people who all deserve respect.
title: We are Not Your Freak Show

description: Just like light, sound, or ocean waves, a dancing body moving freely passes through five distinct rhythmic patterns. These patterns continuously repeat themselves in a wave of motion. The 5Rhythms are: FLOWING – the fluid, continuous, grounded glide of our own movements; STACCATO – the percussive, pulsing beat that shapes us a thousand different ways; CHAOS – the rhythm of letting go, releasing into the catalytic wildness of our dance that can never be planned or repeated; LYRICAL – the rhythm of trance, where the weight of self-consciousness dissolves, where we lighten up and disappear into our own uniqueness; and STILLNESS – the quiet emptiness, where gentle movements rise and fall, start and end, in a field of silence. Please join Marcia Dancing Heart for an introduction to the 5Rhythms at RhythmWave.
title: What are those 5Rhythms anyway? w/Marcia
print_description: A dancing body moving freely passes through five distinct rhythmic patterns. Please join Marcia Dancing Heart for an introduction to the 5Rhythms.

description:
Once a year we put on a show that is a collection of original, sex-positive performance art.  We create a magical experience of performance where we bring together dancers, circus acts, poets, musicians, and more all answering that one provocative question ... 
What is Erotic?

What Is Erotic? is an invitation to artists of all kinds to join our mission to reclaim sexuality as a powerful resource, and explore all the ways in which human beings experience pleasure and arousal.  From songs to storytelling, dancing to disrobing, come witness the courage and creative imagination of dozens of artists.  We are sex-positive theater...with a happy ending!
title: “What Is Erotic?”
print_description: From song-storytelling, dancing-disrobing, come witness the creative imagination of dozens of artists. We're a sex-positive show w/ a happy ending!

description: Art Cars were so 2014, this year ShangriLa is bringing ART BARS to the Playa. The new ShangriLaLa Weinkeller will bring a little bit of the Orient and a whole lot of whimsy to the Playa with its painstaking design details and solid recycled wood construction. Camp members are asked to dress in formal attire. Throw in a little flogging with a cat-o-nine tails and it will be a night to remember. Please dress in your formal wear for this evening. Bring a bottle of your favorite wine and wine glass as well. In Vino Veritas - in Wine lies the truth. There are four (4) recognized stages to wine tastings: Appearance, The Aroma of the Wine, Sensations of the Mouth and The Finish (aftertaste). Please make sure you have your ID ready - you have to be twenty-one (21) years old to drink @ ShangriLaLa. We will check your ID - Namaste.

description:
We are exploring an exhibition / fun event in the temple on Thursday for a wrestling event Indian Style (East Indian called Kushti). But any kind of wrestling in an inflated rubber tub filled with mud. Wrestlers are welcome to wear a traditional wrap, speedo, shorts or ...nothing.

This is for fun and not to be taken too seriously. An official and first aide person will be present. Participants can be any gender and an audience will surround the tub and are encouraged to bring playa gifts for the winners. Reward your warriors.

WANT TO PARTICIPATE? Stay engaged here on this event. If you want to camp with Sun Guardians follow the links in the about section. We are exploring the idea and encouraging people to come join in on the fun as a participant!

Audience or Wrestler... come have fun and tell us what you think.

description:
The Zendo is a community outreach project at Burning Man that offers education and psychological support, with the goal to help reduce the potential harms involved in drug use. Volunteers provide peer-to-peer harm reduction support for individuals having a difficult drug-related experience and who don't require medical care. Guests are sometimes actively on substance, and other times are seeking integration support, or education about the risks involved in drug use. We staff the space 24/7 with trained mental health and medical professionals who provide oversight, as well as individuals experienced in crisis response.

If you'd like to come to the training to learn more about volunteering, it will take place at Something Freaky This Way Foams, near 2:00&G, on Tuesday September 1 at 11AM. 

The four principles of psychedelic harm reduction include: 

1. Create a safe space - If someone is having a challenging experience try to move them into a comfortable, warm, and calm environment. If possible, try to avoid noisy or crowded spaces. Ask what would make them most comfortable. Offer blankets and water. 

2. Sitting, not guiding - Be a calm presence of acceptance, compassion, and caring. Promote feelings of trust and security. Let the person's unfolding experience be the guide. Don't try to get ahead of their process. Explore distressing issues if they want, but know that simply being with the person is supportive and talking may not be helpful.

3. Talk through, not down - Invite the person to explore what's happening and encourage them to try not to resist it. Remind them that they are safe. 

4. Difficult is not the same as bad - challenging experiences can wind up being our most valuable and lead to learning and growth. Help the person integrate the experience, and remind them the experience will continue to unfold.
title: Zendo Project
print_description: Feeling out of sorts? Visit Zendo where you'll find a calm space and volunteers who are available 24/7 to help with difficult psychedelic experiences.

description: The Zen Garden is a 24/7 peaceful, shaded space for anyone needing to chill out, cool down, and ground. There will be Zen Geishas (look for kimonos) monitoring the tent throughout the days and nights in case you need someone to check in with - or just hug. We will also post daily schedules of meditation, yoga, tea service, or other nice things, so come by!

description: The world acclaimed author of Zero Waste Home, aka the “priestess of waste free living”, Bea Johnson, will share her tribulations and secrets to reducing her family’s trash to a quart jar per year. Through this upbeat presentation, you'll discover the amazing advantages that the zero waste lifestyle has to offer: they might be very different from what you’d expect!
title: Zero Waste Home
